As a married parent of three children, Gelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport.  Gelyn is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Gelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 1 loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Maingerel

texts.en:
Mrs. Maingerel, 31 years old, lives with her husband, daughter and son in a traditional Mongolian ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. She has been selling phone accessories by renting a stall at a trade center since 2012. 

Her husband, together with three other people, decorates house interiors. Their daughter and son go to kindergarten. She is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to buy phone accessories at wholesale prices, so that she can continue to run her business without worrying about inventory shortage. She is a very hardworking woman who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to buy phone accessories.

loans.name: Piling Subur Group

texts.en:
The Piling Subur group has successfully paid off all of the previous loan, and after some period of loans being granted to them, they are really grateful and thankful to MUK, Kiva and the Lenders for supporting their businesses. 

Ni Ketut, 49 years old and a common housewife, runs a pig business to improve the income of her family. With the last loan, she purchased 3 superior piglets and succeeded in selling them all to a big buyer. With the profit she earned, she can support her husband's income to fulfill the family's daily needs and to save for their future.

The Piling Subur group continues to borrow loans to increase their businesses. Ni Ketut was motivated to be a successful pig breeder. Now she will use a portion of the loan to purchase 3 superior piglets and feed for them. With motivation from her husband, she will manage the business better than before and hope for a satisfactory profit. The goal for her is to have enough capital to run the business.

loans.use: to purchase 3 superior piglets and feed.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en: Rosa is a 22-year-old woman with no children. She wants to start a small canteen business, producing and selling chips in her community and also providing tea and coffee. To do this, she needs a loan to buy plastic bags, containers, shopping bags, sugar, tea, coffee, cooking oil and a business license for her business. In the future, Rosa hopes to improve her business. She joined SPBD in 2014 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy plastic bags, containers, shopping bags,  sugar, tea, coffee, cooking oil, and a business license.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Cristo Rey Group

texts.es:
La asociciacion comunal Cristo Rey está conformado por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y dos hombres, padres y madres responsables con quince hijos, bajo su responsabilidad. Son originarios del Sauce lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. Lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudieron estudiar  sus estudios por falta de recursos económicos. En la actualidad luchan día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante, la coordinadora es Ricardo y tiene por actividad económica  una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles como: azúcar, leche, pan, huevos, fósforos, jugos, galletas, gaseosas, queso, tiste. Ella dedica  a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y  surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Cristo Rey agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Cristo Rey” (Christ the King) consists of eight members, six women and two men. They are responsible parents who care for 15 children among them. The members are originally from El Sauce, a place that is located in the western part of the country. They are known for being hardworking, responsible, and having the drive to succeed on a personal level. Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources, they were not able to pursue their studies. At the moment, they strive each day to provide a better future for their children.

Thanks to her efforts and her desire to move forward, Ricarda was appointed the group coordinator. Her business is a small store where she sells products such as sugar, milk, bread, eggs, matches, juices, cookies, sodas, cheese, and “tiste” (a traditional beverage made from corn and cocoa powder). Ricarda devotes approximately 12 hours a day to her business by offering her products. The purpose of her loan is to invest it as operating capital so that she can restock her business of buying and selling basic products. In the near future, she would like to generate more income.

The Communal Bank “Cristo Rey” is grateful for the assistance that Kiva lenders provide to people who have limited resources and come from poor countries, such as Nicaragua, so that they can earn a decent living.

loans.use: to buy various products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is 28 years old and married. She has two children and one of them is currently in school. Jenelyn is in the agricultural business, raising chickens in the Philippines. 

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her chickens. She has been in this business for 3 years now, and has borrowed 1 time in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Jenelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her chickens.

loans.name: Jenjen

texts.en:
Jenjen is 27 years old and has a live-in partner with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell, like bread, biscuits, fabric conditioner, toothpaste, bath soap, detergent soap, etc.

She has borrowed and paid back 1 loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 1 year and also earns additional income from fish vending. Jenjen aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell, like bread, biscuits, fabric conditioner, toothpaste, bath soap, detergent soap, etc.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 30 years old and married with three children. With two children currently in school, Helen works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in the store.

She has been in this business for 1 year and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, soft-drinks, shampoo, detergent soap, noodles, cooking oil, etc. Helen would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Kertha Bakti Group

texts.en:
Ni Luh is the head of the Kertha Bakti group, daily living as a pig farmer. She lives with her husband and 3 children. Ni Luh developed her pig business by borrowing 1,600,000 IDR from MUK. From the sale of 4 pigs during this period, Ni Luh managed to get a profit of 750,000 IDR. The gain is very helpful to the family's finances as they are currently experiencing difficult times due to the increasingly expensive necessities of life.

Ni Luh, with the Kertha Bakti group, decided to continue borrowing from MUK, due to their being especially helpful in developing their pig businesses. Because the price of pigs and pig feed is growing, Ni Luh expects an increase in borrowing in the next period.

She wants to increase her business by keeping local pigs for 'pigroll'. The 'pigs for pigroll' are usually only kept for two or three months and then sold. Ni Luh needs a new loan to purchase 4 local pigs and feed for them. Her husband supports her business by helping her to feed the pigs and clean the barn. Ni Luh saves her profit because she has a dream of renovating her kitchen. 

One of the group members couldn’t attend the meeting because she just had a baby.

loans.use: to purchase 4 local pigs and feed for them.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith is married with six children, all of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members. 

She has a business of a retail shop and has been in this business for 13 years. She has applied for a loan of 700,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap, cooking oil and bags of bread. She generates additional income from poultry farming. 

Edith works in the shop seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include seasonality, defaulters and transportation. She is aspiring of becoming a wholesaler and also to educate her children up to university. 

She decided to join MCDT-SACCO because of its convenience. She resides in the family house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and paying for utility bills.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap, cooking oil, and bags of bread.

loans.name: Amelia

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de alquiler de andamios matalicos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de andamios metalicos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar andamios metalicos.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member is continuing with her business buying, selling and renting out metal scaffolding. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m. She has been in business for several years and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her business selling metal scaffolding. 

The member is requesting a loan to buy metal scaffolding. She is grateful for the loan, and promises to make her installment payments in accordance with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan in order to buy metal scaffolding.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto tiene 29 años de edad y es una persona responsable que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, él tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo, habas y otras productos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer fumigar los cultivos, él agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Roberto is 29 years old, and is a responsible person who farms and raises livestock. He has several parcels of farmland where he grows potatoes, barley, wheat, lima beans and other crops. He belongs to the Nueva Esperanza communal bank. On this occasion he needs a loan to have his crops sprayed. 

He is grateful to the investors for the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making his installment payments.

loans.use: To spray his crops.

loans.name: Anarkan

texts.ru: Анаркан 61 год, замужем, мать пятерых детей. Все дети достаточно взрослые и самостоятельные. У Анаркан - среднее образование,она знает как правильно использовать и планировать денежные средства для достижения поставленных целей. Анаркан в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством. Стартовав 16 лет назад с покупки скота на 12,000 сом (KGS), Анаркан развила свое хозяйство до 2 дойных коров, 2 лошадей и 5 овец. Анаркан также занимается полеводством, на своих 3,0ГА земли она выращивает в основном фасоль и картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анаркан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом на покупку овец, часть средств будет потрачено на покупку минеральных удобрений, Анаркан хочет увеличить сбор урожая и улучшить его качество. Доходы от кредита Анаркан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и хочет накопить средства на строительство нового дома для старшего сына.
texts.en:
Anarkan is 61 and married with five children, all of whom are grown up and living on their own. She has a high school education and knows how to use and budget money correctly in order to achieve financial goals. Anarkan works in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began 16 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 12,000 KGs. She has developed her business and now has two milking cows, two horses and five sheep, as well as a three-hectare plot of land on which she grows primarily beans and potatoes, for a total monthly income of 12,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Anarkan has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan to purchase sheep and fertilizers. She wants to increase the amount of produce she harvests and improve its quality. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further increasing the amount of domestic livestock she has, as well as to save toward building a new house for her oldest son.

loans.use: to buy sheep and fertilizer

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús de 34 años de edad habita al sur de la ciudad con su cónyuge e hijas en las edades de 2 y 4 años. Allí tiene dos negocios, por un lado se dedica a la confección de ropa y por otro lado vende mercancía variada a solicitud de su clientela. Jesús tiene un gran desafío y es fortalecer su capital de trabajo, pues es insuficiente para el cumplimiento de sus metas de manera inmediata y por eso ha acudido a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual accederá a un credikiva, con el cual comprará telas, hilos, e insumos de confecciones para aumentar su producción y también invertirá en mercancías en el marco de los pedidos que ha hecho su clientela. Los principales productos de su oferta son la ropa, el calzado, los cosméticos perfumería y variedades en general. Jesús cuenta con una clientela fija que ha construido desde el año 2007, cuando inició su negocio atendiendo a su vocación en las artes y empresarial, lo cual le facilitó sostenerse en el mercado y crecer gradualmente. En su taller de confección trabaja todas las operaciones del oficio, desde el diseño, la preparación, el ensamble y el acabado de piezas hasta la comercialización del producto y de otros que compra y vende y combina perfectamente.  En la actualidad su meta es fortalecer su capital de trabajo y aumentar la liquidez de su negocio, lo cual poco a poco lo logrará con cada uno de los credikiva que logre en el futuro.
texts.en:
Jesús is 34 years old and resides to the south of the city along with his wife and daughters, ages 2 and 4. He has two businesses, one in which he produces clothing and another in which he sells various merchandise based on his customers’ requests. His greatest wish is to strengthen his operating capital, but he has insufficient funds to accomplish his immediate goals. For this reason, he approached Fundación Mario Santo Domingo about acquiring a Kiva loan. He will use the funds to buy fabrics, thread, and sewing supplies in order to increase his production. Jesús will also invest in brand-name merchandise so that he can fulfill his customers’ orders. The main products he offers are clothes, shoes, cosmetics, perfumes, and other items in general. He has an established clientele that he has been building since 2007.

When he started his enterprise, Jesús chose this line of work because of his creative and business skills, which have helped him to survive in the market place and grow his business gradually. In his tailoring shop, he handles all aspects of his operation including design, preparation, assembly, and finishing each garment for sale. He balances these responsibilities with his buy-and-sell business perfectly. At the moment, his goals are to strengthen his operating capital and to increase the liquidity of his business. His Kiva loan will help him to gradually accomplish each of these goals in the future.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, sewing supplies, and merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es:
Reina, tiene una hija, vive en una casa familiar, con el fin de tener ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su hija  y  colaborar en los gastos del hogar, inicio su venta de productos varios, lo hizo por motivación de amistades, trabajo como empleada y luego el propietario le cedió el local ubicado en el malecón, ya posee 12 años con el negocio.
Comprará prendas de vestir para la playa, agua, frutas, chancletas, gaseosas, jugos, entre otros productos para ofrecer más opciones de compra a sus clientes y tener mejores ventas, espera tener buenas ganancias con las que cancelara la deuda adquirida y contribuir en los gastos familiares.
Su sueño es ampliar su vivienda, agregar nueva mercadería al negocio y resarcir su deuda.
texts.en:
Reina has one daughter and lives in a family home. In order to have income to cover her daughter's expenses and help with household expenses, she started selling various products. She did it at the urging or her friends. She worked as a housekeeper, and the owner gave her the shop situated on the river walk. She has had the business for 12 years.

She will buy beach clothing, water, fruits, flip flops, soft drinks, juices, and other products in order to offer her customers more buying options and to have better sales. She hopes to have good earnings in order to repay the debt she has acquired and to contribute to family expenses.

Her dream is to expand her house, add new merchandise to the business, and pay off her debt.

loans.use: to buy beach clothing, water, fruits, flip flops, soft drinks, juices and other things.

loans.name: Adriana

texts.en:
Adriana is a Kubo Financiero client and this is her story:

Adriana is 42 years old and is a single mother of one. She has been working as a vendor since 1997 for various catalog companies, offering her clients perfumes, cosmetics, diet supplements and other products; additionally she has a stand inside a tianguis (open air market), in which she sells chicken. 

She considers herself good for credit since she sees herself as a responsible person and asks for this one to invest in merchandise for her catalog vending business because her clients are demanding more every time.

Adriana’s biggest motivation to keep on and making an effort at her work is providing a good standard of living for her son, especially education-wise.

loans.use: to stock her catalog products sales business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy damaged cars, repair them and sell them.

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es: Santusa tiene 24 años de edad y es una persona responsable que se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, a la agricultura y a la ganadería, ella tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo, habas y otras productos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para   comprar fertilizantes, ella agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Santusa is 24 years old, and is a responsible person who raises small animals, livestock, and also farms.  She has several parcels of land where she grows potatoes, barley, wheat, lima beans and other crops. She belongs to the Nueva Esperanza communal bank. 

On this occasion she needs the loan to buy fertilizers. She is grateful to the investors for the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her installment payments.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Dúo Lipita De San Mateo Group

texts.es:
Dúo Lupita de San Mateo
Este dúo está  formado por doña María, ella tiene 37 años de edad y se dedica a la venta de tortillas de lunes a domingo los 3 tiempos, así como la venta de tamales, paches, y chuchitos los fines de semana, en la comunidad de San Mateo, ella está solicitando el crédito para la inversión de compra de 10 quintales de maíz, así como la compra de un comal industrial, ya que con el que tiene actualmente, ya no le es suficiente, y necesita comprar otro para que sus dos empleadas trabajen en él, y el resto para la compra de carnes y verduras para la venta de sus comidas y tamales durante la semana, el propósito de ella es servir alimentos en su tortillería ya que la mayoría de sus clientas trabajan en el campo y cuando regresan se sienten cansados por lo que a ella se le ocurrió, no solo tortillas sino también alimentos ya preparados para que sus clientas ya no cocinen y se lleven todo preparado.
texts.en:
“Lupita de San Mateo” Group

This group includes Doña Maria. She is 37 years old and earns her living by selling tortillas three times a week. Maria also sells tamales, “paches” (a variation of tamales made with potatoes), and “chuchitos” (tamales made with corn that is not sweet) on the weekends in the community of San Mateo. She is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of 10 quintals of corn (1 quintal = 100 kg). In addition she will buy an industrial griddle. Maria already has one in her possession, but she needs another one since she has two other employees who work with her. The remainder of her loan will be used to buy meat and vegetables for the tamales and other dishes that she sells throughout the week.

Maria’s goal is to serve her dishes from her tortilla shop. Most of her customers work in the fields and are tired when they arrive at her business. Not only does she want to serve tortillas, but she also wants to provide them with fully-prepared meals so that they don’t have to cook.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies for preparing tortillas and tamales.

loans.name: Erminia

texts.es: Erminia tiene 49 años de edad y es una persona responsable que se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, ella tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo, habas y otras productos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abono, ella agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Erminia is 49 years old and is a responsible person who makes her living in agriculture and livestock.

She has several plots of land where she grows potatoes, barley, wheat, broad beans, and other products. She belongs to the "Nueva Esperanza" ["New Hope"] community bank. This time, she needs the loan to buy seeds and compost.

She is grateful to the investors for the loan, and is committed to making her payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy seeds and compost.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell chicken business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for one year now.

Rosalie requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more chickens to sell.

Rosalie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more chickens to sell.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Milagros is 44 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Milagros has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Milagros requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase an additional box of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Milagros has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Milagros would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional box of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Lolita requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall. She has been in this business for 20 years now.

Lolita would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Lucila

texts.en:
Lucila is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Lucila is 51 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Lucila has a firewood vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 23,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more firewood to sell.

Lucila has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Lucila would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more firewood to sell

loans.name: Anecita

texts.en:
Anecita is 48 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming tomatoes in the Philippines. Anecita is borrowing 13,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional seeds, fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Anecita has been in this business for 20 years and also earns additional income from raising pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional seeds, fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Matilde Rosibel

texts.es:
Matilde, es solera, vive solo con su madre, se dedica a atender un molino nixtamal, también ofrece a sus clientes granos básicos y especias. Su hermano le enseño a desempeñar estas actividades, su jornada inicia a las cinco de la mañana y finalizan a las cinco de la tarde.
El capital que requiere lo utilizara para comprar una tolva y dar mantenimiento al motor del molino, esperar dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, tener mejores ganancias y continuar trabajando para salir adelante.
Su visión es comprar un molino nuevo para aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Matilde is single and lives alone with her mother. She makes her living tending a corn mill. She also offers her customers bulk grains and spices.

Her brother taught her how to do these activities. Her work day starts at five in the morning and ends at five in the afternoon.

She will use the money that she needs to buy a hopper and to perform maintenance on the engine of the mill. She hopes to provide better service to her customers, have better earnings, and to continue working to get ahead.

Her dream is to buy a new mill in order to increase her earnings.

loans.use: to buy a hopper and to perform maintenance on the engine of the mill.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, bricks, sand, rebar, paint, welding electrodes, etc.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 55 years old and widowed with two children. Rosario works very hard to provide for them.

Rosario runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like detergent soap, canned goods, fabric conditioner, shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, etc., to sell. She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as detergent soap, canned goods, fabric conditioner, shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, etc. 

Rosario would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like detergent soap, canned goods, fabric conditioner, shampoo, soft drinks, noodles, etc., to sell

loans.name: Habila Dinora

texts.es:
Habila de 50 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado en su juventud, pues no tuvo el apoyo de sus padres para terminar de manera ideal sus estudios, es madre de cuatro hijos y hace varios años de un tumor que tenia en la cabeza una de sus hijas de 10 años de edad murió. Se caso con su esposo hace ya mas de 20 años, él trabaja todos los días en las hortalizas (cultivos de pepino, frijoles, tomates y chiles)
En la casa de Habila viven una de sus hijas la menor  y una nieta a quien ha crecido desde pequeñita.

Habila trabaja desde hace cuatro años en la crianza de gallinas ponedoras y pollos de engorde, actualmente tiene cuatrocientas pollitas de las cuales cien ya están poniendo huevos y estos los comercializa en la cuidad, hay trescientas pollitas que están en desarrollo.

Trabaja todos los días desde las cinco de la mañana que se levanta y esta pendiente del cuido de las aves hasta ya por la tarde, su esposo le apoya en las tardes cuando regresa de los siembras que poseen en la zona. Antes Habila solo se dedicaba al cuido de sus hijos y del hogar.


Cliente solicita el crédito en credicampo, para la compra de concentrado que le permita darle el desarrollo optimo a sus pollitas, lo cual le permitirá que estas llegen en condiciones para cuando comiencen a poner de ahí ir sacando para el mantenimiento de las pollitas.


Habila sueña con tecnificarse y hacer en el futuro una galera mas amplia para ir incrementando su negocio, que ya lo conoce muy bien y sabe que le es rentable, además quiere que su hija y su nieta sigan creciendo y estudiando para que logren sus objetivos de culminar una profesión.
texts.en:
Habila is 50 years old. She studied up to the fifth grade when she was young, as she did not have her parent’s support for completing her schooling in an ideal manner. She is the mother of four children, and several years ago her ten-year-old daughter died of a brain tumor.

She and her husband have been married for more than 20 years now; and he works every day growing vegetables (cucumbers, beans, tomatoes, and chili peppers). Habila’s youngest daughter and a granddaughter, whom she has been raising since she was very small, live with her in her house. 

Habila has been working for four years raising laying hens and broilers, and currently she has four hundred young chickens.  One hundred of them are already laying eggs, which she sells in the city, and three hundred hens are still maturing. She works every day, beginning at five in the morning when she arises; and she tends to the poultry until well into the afternoon.  Her husband helps her in the afternoon when he returns from the fields that they own in the area.  Before this, Habila dedicated herself solely to caring for her children and her home. 

She is requesting a loan with CrediCampo to purchase chicken feed, which will allow her to provide her chickens with the best conditions for maturing so that they will start laying, and to continue maintaining them. 

Habila dreams of modernizing and enlarging her henhouse in the future, in order to continue expanding her business, as she knows it very well now, and it is profitable for her.  Also, she wants her daughter and her granddaughter to continue growing and studying so that they can achieve their goals of becoming professionals.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her chickens.

loans.name: Elsy Carolina

texts.es:
Elsy, vive con su madre y una hermana, es soltera, sus actividades económicas son atender una pupusería y una sastrería, dichos oficios lo aprendió de su madre, trabaja de lunes a domingo, en un horario de 8:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m., actualmente no representa dificultades en el negocio.
Con el préstamo comprara zippers, botones, hilos, telas, broches, maíz, aceite, quesillo, chicharrón, bebidas, y otros materiales necesarios para que su negocio se mantenga funcionando de la mejor manera.
Su sueño es tener un negocio más rentable para seguir apoyando en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Elsy lives with her mother and sister and is single. Her businesses are selling pupusas (pupusas are Salvadoran grilled stuffed tortillas) and tailoring. She learned these occupations from her mother, and works Monday to Sunday from 8:00 a.m. to 8 p.m. Currently she is not experiencing difficulties with her business. 

With the loan, she will buy zippers, buttons, thread, fabric, clasps, corn, cooking oil, soft cheese, roast pork, drinks, and other materials she needs to keep her businesses running in the best way. 

Her dream is to have a more profitable business so that she can continue helping with the household expenses.

loans.use: To buy zippers, buttons, thread, fabric, clasps, corn, cooking oil, soft cheese, roast pork, drinks and other items.

loans.name: Sarai Del Rosario

texts.es:
Sarai de 33 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos de 17 y 14 años de edad quienes estudian en el centro escolar que esta a media hora de viaje en el transporte urbano de lunes a viernes.

Sarai estudio hasta octavo grado en la escuela de la comunidad y ya no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que sus padres ya no la apoyaron, se caso de 16 años con su esposo quien trabaja en el exterior.

Sarai actualmente trabaja en el kínder desde hace 7 años, ella trabaja de lunes a viernes, los días sábados y domingos y algunas veces en los días de semana Sarai, sale a vender ropa para todas las edades y variada, negocio que incursiono desde hace cuatro años cuando la profesora del kínder donde trabaja le motivo a vender ropa y fue así como ella hoy en día sale a vender a las comunidades aledañas y en el pueblo donde reside.

Antes se dedicaba a los oficios del hogar cuidando a sus hijos.

El préstamo que esta soliictando a CREDICAMPO, es para  invertir $400 dolares en ropa variada para todas las edades, ya que se acerca la temporada de semana santa y es una gran oportunidad para incrementar sus ventas. El resto del dinero lo necesita para ayudar a sus hijos en los pagos de los estudios de sus hijos.
Lo que le permitirá obtener ingresos economicos al hogar y además lograr que sus hijos sigan los estudios.

Sarai sueña con seguir apoyando a sus hijos, para que salgan con sus estudios y puedan continuar en la universidad. También quiere en el futuro mejorar su vivienda para darle a su familia mas comodidad.
texts.en:
Sarai is 33 years old and the mother of two children, ages 17 and 14. From Monday to Friday they attend the school that is a half an hour bus ride away. 

Sarai went as far as a eighth grade in the community school and did not have a chance to continue, due to the fact that her parents no longer supported  her. She married at 16, and her husband works outside the country.

Sarai has been working at a kindergarten for seven years, and works Monday to Friday. On Saturdays and Sundays, and sometimes on weekdays, Sarai goes out to sell a variety of clothing for all ages. She got into the business four years ago, when the teacher at the kindergarten where she works encouraged her to sell clothing. Now she goes out to sell in the neighboring communities, and in the town where she lives. Before, she worked as a housewife, looking after her children. 

The loan she is requesting from CrediCampo is for investing $400 in a variety of clothing for all ages, as the Holy Week season is approaching, and it is a great opportunity for increasing her sales. She needs the rest of the money to help her children pay for their education. 

This will allow her to obtain income for the household and also ensure that her children continue with their education. She dreams of continuing to help her children so that they do well in their studies and continue on to university. She also wants to improve her dwelling in the future, in order to provide her family with more comfort.

loans.use: To invest $400 in a variety of clothing for all ages, and to help her children pay for their education.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix, necesita capital para invertirlo en la compra de harinilla y afrecho para alimentar al ganado en esta época seca, le permitirá tenerlo en óptimas condiciones.
Para Félix los créditos son buenas herramientas que permiten fortalecer el negocio de inmediato, el financiamiento anterior le ayudo a que su cosecha fuera más abundante, sus nuevos ingresos le han permitido cancelar su deuda y dar a su familia mejora educación, salud y alimentación.
texts.en:
Félix needs capital to invest in middlings and bran to feed livestock during this dry season. This will allow him to have it in top condition. 

For Félix, the loans are good tools that help him immediately strengthen his business. 

The last loan helped him so that his crop was abundant. 

The new income has helped him to pay back a loan and give his family a better education, health and food.

loans.use: to buy middlings and bran to feed livestock

loans.name: Salomena

texts.es: Salomena 30 tiene años de edad y es una persona responsable que se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos como por ejemplo chompas, chalinas, chullos y otros, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Nueva Esperanza” en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar lana de oveja y alpaca, ella agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Salomena is 30 years old, and she is a responsible person. She knits sweaters, scarves, caps, and other items, and she belongs to the communal bank, “Nueva Esperanza” [New Hope].

On this occasion she is requesting a loan in order to purchase sheep’s wool and alpaca. She thanks the lenders for the loan, and she promises to make her payments very responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase sheep's wool and alpaca.

loans.name: Xilonem Indira

texts.es:
La venta de ropa usada es un auge que cada día se extiende  por todo el país, por esa razón miles de personas se han dedicado a comercializarla. Xilonem, originaria de Teustepe también se sintió atraída por este negocio y empezó a ofrecer prendas de segunda mano en varias zonas. Con el apoyo de su esposo fue encontrando las rutas necesarias para comercializar de manera rápida la ropa y obtuvo una buena aceptación entre el público. 
Es madre de tres niños y por su embarazo suspendió  sus  viajes constantes a los  pueblos que le producían buenos ingresos. Sin embargo, su madre le aconsejó retomar el negocio y  buscar apoyo para contar con más capital. Solicita el préstamo para comprar: Una paca de blusas, y una paca de ropa de niños. Ahora podrá regresar a las rutas en donde inició la venta de ropa y su negocio crecerá.
texts.en:
The sale of used clothes is a boom that spreads throughout the country every day.  For this reason, thousands of people have devoted themselves to selling them.  Xilonem, who is from Teustepe, was also attracted to this business.  She started selling second hand clothes in several areas.  With the support of her husband, she was finding the routes that were needed to sell the clothes rapidly.  She was well-accepted by the public.

She is the mother of three children.  She suspended her constant trips to the towns that produced good income for her due to her pregnancy.  Nevertheless, her mother advised her to take up her business again and to look for support in order to have more capital.

She is requesting the loan to buy a bundle of blouses and a bundle of children’s clothes.  She will now be able to return to the routes where she started selling clothes, and her business will grow.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of blouses and a bundle of children’s clothes.

loans.name: Jacobo Irene

texts.es:
Jacobo es un joven de 28 años,  él es una persona muy trabajadora es soltero, estudio hasta tercer grado, decidió mejor trabajar la tierra en vez de estudiar  esto lo hizo para ayudarle a sus padres , no tiene hijos, ya que vive con su mamá; ella depende totalmente de él, su fuente de trabajo es la agricultura desde hace más de diez años se dedica a esta actividad la aprendió de sus padre él le enseño a sacarle frutos a la tierra, aparte de la agricultura también se dedica a trabajar como ayudante de albañilería,  trabaja todos los días de seis de la mañana hasta las tres de la tarde.
El crédito lo necesita para terminar de construir su casa,  ya que solo la tiene empezada  y necesita terminar la construcción de su vivienda , sus sueños es terminar sus casa para vivir mejor para que el día que forme su propio hogar su futura esposa y sus hijos tengan un lugar estable donde vivir.
texts.en:
Jacobo is a young man of 28 and a very hard-working person. He went as far as third grade in school, and decided that it was better to work the land instead of going to school. He did this to help his parents. He has no children and lives with his mother who depends totally on him. His livelihood is farming, which he has done for more than 10 years. He learned this occupation from his father, who taught him to raise crops on the land. 

Apart from farming, he also works as a builder's helper, and works every day from six in the morning until three in the afternoon. He needs the loan to finish building his home, as he only has it started, and needs to finish building it. 

His dream is to finish his home so that he can live better; and so that the day he starts his own household, his future wife and his children will have a  permanent place to live.

loans.use: To finish building his house.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
La unión hace la fuerza, Miriam y su esposo son ejemplo de ello, hace diez años iniciaron en el negocio de la comercialización de muebles y camas; con lo que han logrado salir adelante. Ella es originaria de la ciudad de Granada, tiene 67 años de edad, es una señora emprendedora y motivadora. Su mano derecha es su marido, quién es carpintero. Su negocio se ha mantenido en pie gracias a la pensión mensual que reciben. Juntos son una pareja vivaz, puesto que él crea y ella comercializa. 
Miriam solicita el crédito para la compra de madera aserrío, esta servirá para el proceso de los muebles y camas. Ella confía plenamente en el financiamiento que brinda Kiva y MiCrédito, puesto que serán un soporte en el cumplimiento de sus metas. Ambos anhelan ofrecer mejor producto  para obtener mejores clientes y la producción no se paralice, pues quieren asegurar una vejez tranquila y sin deudas. Uno de sus planes a futuro, es comprar maquinaria para la mejor elaboración de los muebles, sus ganas de trabajar son inagotables.
texts.en: Unity gives strength- Miriam and her husband are an example of that.  Ten years ago, they entered the business of selling furniture and beds.  With what they have accomplished, they keep moving forward.  She is originally from the city of Granada. Miriam is 67 years old, and she is an entrepreneurial and inspirational woman.  Her right hand man is her husband, who is a carpenter.  Their business has stayed intact thanks to the monthly pension that they receive.  Together, they are a lively couple.  He creates and she sells the merchandise.  Miriam is requesting a loan for the purchase of lumber.  This will be used for the process of making the furniture and beds.  She confides fully in the financing that Kiva and MiCrédito offer, given that they will be a support system in helping to meet her goals.  Both hope to offer the best product in order to obtain better clients and so that production is not paralyzed.  They want to ensure a peaceful old age and debt-free.  One of their plans for the future is to buy machinery for improved design of the furniture.  Their work efforts are limitless.

loans.use: to purchase lumber

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes and boots at whole sale.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, pan, gaseosas, cigarros, cerveza, chocolates, conservas y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo, sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz , fideos, conservas y otras, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Estela is an enterprising and hard-working woman who sells groceries such as rice, sugar, noodles, bread, soft drinks, cigarettes, beer, chocolates, canned goods and other items. She has worked in this business for several years now and it is going very well. 

On this occasion, she needs the loan to buy merchandise such as bags of sugar, bags of rice, noodles, canned goods and other items. She is grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as bags of sugar, bags of rice, noodles, canned goods and other items.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: Sandra de 30 años de edad, es la propietaria de una peluquería ubicada en un barrio cercano a la playa, donde el sol, la brisa el calor y el mar, hacen sentir el sabor del caribeño Colombiano, alegre y extrovertido.  Su experiencia de negocio inició desde hace 2 años, cuando prestaba el servicio de corte de cabello a domicilio, entre sus familiares, vecinos  y amigos; estos poco a poco fueron refiriéndoles a otros clientes y así fue creciendo su negocio. Hoy su clientela la llama por teléfono y Sandra le programa su servicio a la medida en la casa del cliente. Su meta es adecuar una infraestructura que la ayude a impactar más  sus ingresos, siendo reconocida por el sector, para no tener que movilizarse, como usualmente lo hace y  con ello lograr captar muchos más clientes . En la actualidad está aplicando aun credikiva, mediante el cual comprará insumos de peluquería en un mayor volumen, como tintes, enjuagues, champú y productos capilares en general. Su mayor desafío es lograr tener día a día nuevos clientes y su gran sueño y el de su conyuge, es comprar su propia casa para sentirse feliz con él y su hija de 17 años de edad.
texts.en:
Sandra, age 30, has a hairdresser’s shop that is located in a neighborhood close to a beach.  The sun, the warm breeze, and the sea make you feel the flavor of the Caribbean Columbian, which is happy and extroverted.  She started her business experience two years ago when she cut hair at home for relatives, neighbors, and friends.  They were, little by little, referring other customers to her.  That is how her business was growing.

Now, her customers call her on the phone, and Sandra schedules her service at the customer’s house.  Her goal is to adapt the infrastructure in a way that will help impact her income more.  As she is well-known in the area, she will do this so that she does not have to move around as she usually does.  With this she will get many more customers.

She is currently applying for a Kiva loan to buy supplies in greater volume for her hairdressing business.  She will buy things like dyes, rinses, shampoo, and general hair products.  

Her biggest challenge is managing to have new customers day to day.  Her big dream, and that of her husband, is to buy her own house in order to be happy with him and their 17 year old daughter.

loans.use: to buy supplies in greater volume for her hairdressing business.

loans.name: Martín Alexander

texts.es:
Martín de 36 años de edad, soltero, estudio hasta segundo grado en la escuela de su comunidad donde reside, es padre de un niño de 12 años de edad, de quien siempre esta pendiente con lo necesario para apoyarlo en sus estudios.  Procede de una familia de siete hermanos los cuales ya todos tienen sus propias familias y es solo él quien esta con su madre quien depende de él.

Martín trabaja propio desde hace ocho años cuando con sus propios esfuerzos compro un vehículo que trabaja todos los días haciendo viajes en las comunidades aledañas donde vive. Se decidió al ver la necesidad de obtener sus propios ingresos y ayudar a su familia a tener una mejor calidad de vida. Trabaja todos los días de la semana hace un promedio de cuatro viajes al día y también trabaja la agricultura (siembra de maíz y frijoles)

Solicita el crédito en CREDICAMPO,  para comprar cinco terneras valorados cada una en $300.00 las cuales repastara por unos meses para luego sacarlas a la venta y así emprender con este negocio de la compra y venta de ganado. 
Ello le permitirá tener otra fuente que le genere ingresos económicos y poseer una mejor calidad de vida.

Martín sueña con estar siempre apoyando a su hijo y a su madre, trabajar muy duro cada día para darles una mejor calidad de vida. Además en el futuro sueña comprar otro vehículo mas nuevo que le permita desarrollar mejor su trabajo.
texts.en:
Martín is 36 years old and single. He went as far as second grade in the school of the community where he lives. He is the father of a 12-year-old son, and is always concerned with providing him what he needs for his education. 

He comes from a family of seven brothers and sisters who now all have their own families. It is only him who is with his mother, who depends on him. 

Martin has been working on his own for eight years, and with his own efforts bought a vehicle which he operates every day, making trips in the neighboring communities. He made the decision to do this, seeing the need to earn his own income and help his family have a better quality of life. 

He works every day of the week and makes around four trips a day; and also farms, growing corn and beans. He is requesting a loan from CrediCampo in order to buy five calves, each one valued at $300, which he will pasture for some months to later sell, and this way launch this business of buying and selling cattle. This will allow him to have another source of income and a better quality of life. 

Martin dreams of always helping his son and his mother; working very hard each day to give them a better quality of life. In addition, in the future, he dreams of buying another, newer vehicle which will allow him to do his work better.

loans.use: To buy five calves.

loans.name: Juan Ángel

texts.es:
Juan de 46 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado pues comenta que sus padres no lo quisieron seguir mandando a la escuela si no que lo pusieron a trabajar en el campo, él es casado su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y cuidar  de sus cuatro hijos de las edades de  una niña de 16 años y tres niños de 13, 12, 11 años de edad y que actualmente están estudiando en la escuela y son las únicas personas que dependen de él.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura especialmente en la siembra de hortalizas tomate, frijol y huisquil  comenta que tiene 10 años de dedicarse a este trabajo es una amplia experiencia en la siembra de hortalizas que lo aprendió gracias a un tío que lo indujo a trabajar en hortalizas, Juan también tiene otras actividades de trabajo como albañil y también trabaja con un tractor agrícola que es propio de él. Los cultivos de hortalizas los tiene a una distancia de 2 kilómetros, el cual tiene que caminar para llegar a ellos y el siempre recibe el apoyo de su esposa y sus hijos en todas la actividades de su cultivo.


El crédito lo utilizara parar invertirlo en sus cultivos de hortalizas específicamente en un huisquilar que quiere plantar específicamente él comprara alambre,  fertilizantes y abono para el cultivo, preparación de tierra y pago de mano de obra, pues era un deseo que tenia de tener un cultivo de huisquil en sus tierras gracias a esto él espera  mejores ingresos económicos para él y su familia. 

Juan siempre ha querido para el futuro  mejorar sus cultivos poder expandirlos más y producir mucho más para comercializarlos en otros mercados más competentes, también tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, mejorar su vivienda y que sus hijos sigan estudiando para que sean personas de bien en la sociedad y logren terminar la carrera universitario que más les gusta.
texts.en:
Juan is 46 years old.  He attended school through third grade because his parents did not want to continue sending him so he could work in the fields.  He is married and his wife cares for their home and four children.  He has a 16 year old daughter and three sons who are 13, 12, and 11 years old.  They all attend school and are the only people who depend on him.

Juan works as a farmer, especially planting vegetables, tomatoes, beans, and chayote.  He says he has done this work for 10 years and has a lot of experience planting vegetables.  He learned this work from an uncle who introduced him to working with vegetables.  Juan also works as a construction worker and works with a tractor that he owns.  His crops are located two kilometers away and he has to walk to get there.  He always receives the support of his wife and children with all of his farm work.

He will use this loan to invest in his vegetable crops, specifically his chayote crops, which he wants to plant.  He will purchase wire, fertilizer, and compost for the crops, prepare his land, and pay for laborers.  He wants to have a chayote crop on his land because it will bring him more profits for him and his family.  

Juan has always wanted to improve his crops to be able to expand them in the future and produce much more to sell them in other, more competitive markets.  He also wants a better quality of life for his family, to improve his home, and that his children continue studying so that they become good people in society and succeed in finishing their university degrees.

loans.use: to purchase wire, fertilizer, and compost for his chayote crops.

loans.name: Anna Elizabeth

texts.es:
Anna, vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos de 26, 21 y 16 años de edad, desde muy joven aprendió en su familia a elaborar y vender pupusas, tortillas, comidas típicas, cuenta con un  negocio en el que ofrece estos productos,  tiene 20 años trabajando de manera independiente.
El crédito que solicita lo utilizara para comprar maíz, gas propano, quesillo, aceite, condimentos, tomates, aderezos, bebidas y otros materiales que necesita para elaborar la venta, espera tener un aumento en la rentabilidad de su negocio para cancelar sus deudas y mejorar su vida familiar.
Su aspiración es que su negocio sea autosuficiente para tener mayores beneficios.
texts.en: Anna lives together with her husband and three children who are 26, 21 and 16 years old.  From a very young age, she learned in her family how to make and sell pupusas, tortillas, traditional dishes - and as such, she has a business that offers these products.  She has been working independently for 20 years.  The loan that she requests will be used to purchase corn, propane gas, cheese, oil, condiments, tomatoes, dressings, drinks, and other materials that she needs to develop her sales.  She hopes to have an improvement in the profitability of her business in order to cancel her debts and improve their family life.  Her hope is that her business will be self-sufficient through improved revenue.

loans.use: to purchase corn, propane gas, cheese, oil, spices, tomatoes, dressings, drinks, and other materials.

loans.name: Rosa Augusta

texts.es:
La socia Rosa se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de alquiler de dormitorio, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member Rosa continues working in her grocery store, selling basic food items such as rice, sugar, milk, and biscuits. She also has a business renting rooms. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. She has had her business for 5 years now, and it is going very well for her. 

Her dream is to expand her grocery store, and she is requesting a loan in order to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and biscuits. 
The member is happy for the loan, and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, milk, and biscuits.

loans.name: Denis Emerson

texts.es: Denis tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa, padres, tres tías, un primo y su pequeño hijo de 10 años de dad. Denis trabaja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad y es así como apoya con la economía del hogar. Con mucho esfuerzo ha comenzado hacer su vivienda  ya que desea dar mejores condiciones habitacionales a su familia. Por falta de recursos no ha logrado terminar la casa ya que los recursos económicos no le alcanzan para terminar el techo y para comprar puertas y ventanas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de polines, ventanas y dos puertas para la vivienda y así poder finalizarla y mudarse lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Denis, 48, lives in his own house with his wife, parents, three aunts, a cousin and his small 10 year old son. 

Denis works as an employee at a company located close to his house which is how he supports the household economy. 

With a lot of effort he has started working on his house as he wants to improve the living conditions of his family. 

Due to lack of economic resources he has not been able to finish the house. He has not been able to finish the roof nor buy doors and windows. 

He is requesting a loan to FUSAI to invest in buying building equipment, windows and two doors for the house and in this way he can finish it and move as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building equipment, windows and two doors for the house

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es: Concepción es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de platos típicos de la región como por ejemplo caldo de gallina, malaya frita, pescado frito y otros. En esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo aceite, carne, sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, verduras, latas de leche, bolsas de fideos y botellas de aceite.
texts.en:
Concepción is a hardworking and enterprising woman who works selling traditional dishes from her region, including chicken soup, fried steak, fried fish, and others.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase supplies, including oil, meat, sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, vegetables, cans of milk, bags of pasta, and bottles of oil.

loans.use: to purchase supplies, including oil, meat, sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, vegetables, cans of milk, bags of pasta, and bottles of oil.

loans.name: Herminia

texts.es: Herminia se dedica a la venta de ferretería donde vende diferentes productos como por ejemplo calaminas, clavos, alambres, pinturas y otras cosas más. En esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo pinturas, clavos, tornillos, cerraduras, siliconas y otras, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Herminia has a hardware store where she sells products such as sheet metal roofing, nails, wire, paint and other things. On this occasion, she needs a loan to buy merchandise such as paint, nails, screws, locks, sealants, and other items. 

She is is grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as paint, nails, screws, locks, sealants and other items.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La socia Justina se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de leña ,la socia vende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la leña.La socia solicita el credito para comprar leña.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Justina continues working at her business selling firewood.  She works from 8:00am until 6:00pm.  She has been doing this work for many years and it is going well.  Her dream is to have a store where she can sell the firewood.  

She is requesting this loan to buy firewood.  She is happy with this loan and promises to make her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to purchase firewood.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: Manuela se dedica a la compra y venta de condimentos, granos secos, papa, cereales entonces envía sus productos a las revendedoras de uno de los mercados populares de la ciudad del Cusco. En esta oportunidad ella requiere el préstamo para comprar más granos secos como por ejemplo cebada,  maíz y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
Manuela buys and sells spices, dry grains, potatoes and cereals.  

She then sends her products to one of the resellers in one of the popular markets in the city of Cusco. 

At this time she is requesting a loan to buy more dry grains such as barley, corn etc.

loans.use: to buy more dry grains such as barley, corn etc.

loans.name: Senia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Senia, le gusta aportar en los gastos familiares, por lo que desde hace dos años se dedica a la venta de calzado y ropa de manera ambulante, trabaja todos los días. Senia tiene 24 años de edad, vive en casa de su madre, tiene dos hijos de 1 y 3 años de edad.
Requiere un crédito para comprar variedad de calzado y ropa, surtirá el inventario de su negocio, espera atraer nuevos clientes, aumentar sus ventas e ingresos, cancelar con buen record crediticio y dar a su familia un buen estilo de vida.
Su visión es tener un  negocio con nuevos y mejores productos que aumenten su rentabilidad.
texts.en:
Senia likes to help with the household expenses, so for two years she has worked selling footwear and clothing as a street vendor. She works every day. Senia is 24 years old, lives in her mother's home, and has two children, ages 1 and 3. 

She needs a loan in order to buy a variety of footwear and clothing and stock the inventory of her business. She hopes to attract new customers, increase her sales and revenues, repay with a great credit record, and give her family a good standard of living.

Her plan is to have a business with new and better products, which will increase its profitability.

loans.use: To buy a variety of footwear and clothing.

loans.name: Sandra Lorena

texts.es:
Sandra, comenta que el préstamo anterior le permitió cancelar de manera rápida los diferentes pedidos de los productos de revista que vende, sea mantenido trabajando y generando los ingresos que necesita para salir adelante.
En esta ocasión solicita un nuevo préstamo para comprar lociones, cremas, maquillajes, talcos, desodorantes, etc., para cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes y seguir teniendo los recursos económicos para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Sandra says that the previous loan allowed her to quickly fill the various orders for the catalog products that she sells. This has allowed her to continue working and to generate the income she needs to keep going.

On this occasion she is requesting a new loan in order to buy lotions, creams, makeup, powders, deodorants, etc. so that she can fill her customer orders and continue having the financial resources to get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy lotions, creams, makeup, powders, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Maria Ignacia

texts.es:
María, prepara su inventario para estas fechas de vacaciones, ya que las ventas aumentan un poco, por esa razón se ha decidido por solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar maíz, yuca, bebidas, aceite, harina, chicharrón, quesillo, bolsas, servilletas, para elaborar pupusas y antojitos.
Con el capital que se le proporciono antes tuvo a su disposición los materiales que necesitaba para elaborar la venta, su situación económica es más favorable.
texts.en:
María is getting her supplies ready for the holiday season, as sales increase a bit. For that reason she has made the decision to request a new loan to buy corn, yuca, drinks, cooking oil, flour, roast pork, soft cheese, bags and napkins. These are for making pupusas and snacks (pupusas are Salvadoran grilled stuffed tortillas). 

With the working capital she received before, she had on hand the supplies she needed to make her goods, and her financial situation is more favorable.

loans.use: To buy corn, yuca, drinks, cooking oil, flour, roast pork, soft cheese, bags and napkins.

loans.name: Santos Higinia

texts.es:
Santos de 56 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos ya mayores de edad y de los cuales uno trabaja en un molino en la comunidad y el mayor trabaja en panamá desde hace ya varios años. Estudio solamente seis meses, ya que en esos años estaba difícil la situación del país que vivía en esa época un conflicto armado y tenia que cuidar de sus hermanos menores.

Santos por muchos años trabajo en la ciudad cuidando y haciendo los oficios en una vivienda, la necesidad la hizo que partiera de su familia pues quería salir adelante y tener otras condiciones de vida, se fue a los quince años de edad.
Hoy en día trabaja en la siembra de maíz y de frijoles en la comunidad para tener el sustento cada día y cuando puede sale a trabajar a casa que la buscan para lavarlas y en diferentes oficios, de donde obtiene sus ingresos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a credicampo, es  para comprar medicinas y poder ir a unas consultas en el hospital que le han dejado, ya que se ha sentido mal de salud lo que le dificulta seguir trabajando. También invertirá $500 para los trabajos en la agricultura que se avecinan y así salir adelante con sus hijos.


Santos dentro de sus sueños esta el mejorar su vivienda que tiene de bahareque y tener mejores condiciones de vida, pues ya necesita cambiarle la madera a su casa y parte de su techo esta en malas condiciones, lo que espera lograr con el esfuerzo de ella y de sus hijos los cuales siempre están pendientes de ella.
texts.en:
Santos, 56, is a single mother of grown children. One of them works at a mill in the community and the eldest has been working in Panama for several years. 

She only studied for 6 months since, during those years, the country was going through a difficult time with an armed conflict and she had to take care of her younger siblings. 

For many years Santos worked in the city taking care of and doing chores in a house. This required that she separate from her family because she wanted to get ahead and have other living conditions. She left at fifteen. 

Currently she works growing corn and beans in the community in order to have enough to eat every day and when she can, she goes out and works cleaning houses and in other jobs. 

The loan she is requesting from Credicampo is to buy medicines and to go to some appointments in the hospital. 

She has been feeling sick which makes it hard for her to keep working. 

She will also invest $500 in farming and in this way get ahead with her children. 

Santos dreams of improving her house made of adobe and to have better living conditions. She also needs to change the wood in her house and part of the roof is in bad condition. 

This is what she is hoping to accomplish with the effort put in by her and her children who are always taking care of her.

loans.use: to buy medicines, go to some appointments in the hospital and to invest in farming.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase various products and cosmetics.

loans.name: Las Triunfadoras De Ayabaca Group

texts.es:
JENNIFER VICTORIA, tiene 20 años de edad. Ella forma parte del grupo "Las Triunfadoras de Ayabaca" que está formado por seis socios.

Desde hace mas de un año Jennifer Victoria se dedica a la venta de comida - lonche por las tardes, en un pequeño espacio en su domicilio ella ofrece la comida que prepara todos los días, así como también sanguches y bebidas frías y calientes.
El préstamo recibido desea invertirlo en la compra de algunos insumos que ella puede adquirir en mayor cantidad y así obtener un menor precio, y en algunas mejoras en el lugar de venta.
texts.en:
Jennifer Victoria is 20 years old. She is a member of  of the group "Las Triunfadoras de Ayabaca" (The Winners of Ayabaca).

It is made up of six members. 

For over a year Jennifer Victoria has been selling food. She sells lunch in the afternoons in a small space in her house. 

She makes food every day as well as sandwiches and cold and hot drinks. 

She plans on investing the loan and buying supplies in bulk and in this way get them at a better price. 

She will also make some improvements to the sales space.

loans.use: to buy supplies to sell lunch and to improve the place of work.

loans.name: Margot

texts.es:
Margot continúa trabajando en una entidad del estado pero en sus horas libres continuas dedicándose  atender su bar y le va muy bien. 

Margot pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar bebidas como cerveza y gaseosas, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Margot continues to work for a state entity but, in her spare time, she is still running her bar and it is going very well.

Margot has been part of the "Virgen del Rosario" communal bank for a while and at this time is requesting a loan to buy drinks such as beer and soda. 

She appreciates and values the loan and is committed to pay the monthly installments with a lot of responsibility.

loans.use: to buy drinks such as beer and soda.

loans.name: Ibeth

texts.es: Ibeth es una mujer alegre y trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de repuestos de motocicletas, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios entonces en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar repuestos como cadenas, espejos, pistones, llantas y  otras cosa más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Ibeth is a cheerful and hard-working woman who sells motorcycle parts. She has belonged to the "Virgen del Rosario”  communal bank for several years. 

She needs the loan in order to buy parts such as chains, mirrors, pistons, tires and other items. She is grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy parts such as chains, mirrors, pistons, tires and other items.

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es: Maximiliana es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica al negocio de venta de comida donde expende diferentes platos  típicos de la región como por ejemplo, arroz con huevo, pescado frito, caldo de gallina, malaya frita y otros, ella  pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios años entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, latas de leche, bolsas de fideos y botellas de aceite y otros, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Maximiliana is an enterprising woman who has a food stand where she sells various traditional dishes of the region, such as rice with egg, fried fish, chicken soup, Peruvian fried beef, and other items. She has belonged to the “Virgen del Rosario” communal bank for several years.

On this occasion, she needs the loan to buy supplies such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, cans of milk, bags of noodles, bottles of cooking oil, as well as other items. She is grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, cans of milk, bags of noodles, bottles of cooking oil, as well as other items.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es: Flora es profesora pero en sus horas libres se dedica a la venta de comida pues tiene un pequeño restaurante, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios entonces en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo verduras, carnes, fideos y otras cosa más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Flora is a teacher, but in her free time sells food, as she has a small restaurant. She has belonged to the "Virgen del Rosario" communal bank for several years, and on this occasion needs the loan to buy supplies such as vegetables, meat, noodles and other things. 

She is grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as vegetables, meat, noodles and other things.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria se dedica a sus negocios de librería y heladería y le va muy bien y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo helados, gaseosas, agua mineral, regalos, peluches, tarjetas navideñas, papeles, lapiceros, cuadernos y otras cosa más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Maria works in her bookstore and ice cream businesses, and it is going very well. On this occasion, she needs the loan in order to buy merchandise such as ice cream, soft drinks, mineral water, gifts, stuffed toys, Christmas cards, paper, pens, notebooks, and other items.

She is grateful for and appreciates the loan, and promises to be very responsible in making her monthly installment payments.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as ice cream, soft drinks, mineral water, gifts, stuffed toys, Christmas cards, paper, pens, notebooks and other items.

loans.name: Kamidakan

texts.ru: Камидакан 56 лет, замужем, мать 2 сыновей, оба работают в Российской Федерации. У Камидакан среднее образование, уже 21 год занимается разведением скота, начав этот бизнес с 25,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря неустанному труду и выдержке Камидакан, на сегодняшний день она получает ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом (KGS). Для разведения скота у нее есть все условия. Летом Камидахан отправляет скот на джайлоо, зимой содержит в сараях. В хозяйстве у Камидакан имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 3 лошади и 10 овец. В целях увеличения поголовья скота Камидакан обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом на покупку овец для дальнейшего их разведения. На доходы от кредита Камидакан планирует увеличить поголовье скота, а также улучшить материальное благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Kamidakan is 56, married and the mother of two sons who both work in the Russian Federation.  She has the equivalent of a high-school education and has been a livestock farmer for 21 years, having set up her farm with 25,000 som worth of startup capital.  She has everything she needs to efficiently raise livestock.  In the summer, she sends her animals to pasture high in the mountains and keeps them in sheds during the winter.  Thanks to her tireless efforts and perseverance, she currently makes around 15,000 som a month and has two dairy cows, three horses and ten sheep on her farm.  To bolster her flocks, Kamidakan is seeking a loan to buy sheep.  She plans on using any additional income due to the loan to continue to buy more livestock, as well as improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: buy sheep

loans.name: Teodolinda

texts.es:
Teodolinda  tiene cuarenta y ocho años,  es madre soltera solamente estudio hasta tercer grado,  ya que su familia no contaba con los medios para enviarla a estudiar, tiene dos hijos de los cuales uno depende de ella directamente y solamente vive con su hijo;  ella se dedica a trabajar fuertemente en una pupuseria del pueblo,  trabaja ahí hace más de cinco años solamente a esto se dedica,  ella aprendió a trabajar de una amiga que le enseño, ella viaja todos los días a su trabajo en donde recorre unos cinco kilómetros  trabaja desde las seis de la mañana hasta las cuatro de la tarde todos los días.
 El crédito lo necesita para pagar algunas deudas que ha adquirido por su familia para salir delante, en el futuro planea que sus hijos tengan lo que ella no pudo tener , lo que es una vivienda en buenas condiciones y que se preparen para que el futuro puedan mantenerse por sí solos.
texts.en: Teodolinda is 48 years old and a single mother.  She only studied through the third grade since her family did not have the means to continue sending her to study.  She has two children, of whom one depends on her directly and she only lives with her son.  Teodolinda works very hard in a pupuseria in town, where she has been working for more than five years only dedicated to that.  She learned how to do her work from a friend who taught her.  She travels every day to her work, which is a commute of approximately 5 kilometers. Teodolinda works from six in the morning until four in afternoon every day. She needs the loan in order to pay some debts that she acquired for her family to move forward.  In the future, she plans to give her children what she could not have - one of which is a house in good conditions and also to be prepared in the future to take care of themselves.

loans.use: to pay some debts that she has acquired.

loans.name: Yessica Natalia

texts.es: Jessica es una persona trabajadora que se dedica a la venta cerveza y comida entonces tiene una pequeña tienda donde expende sus productos, ella  pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios años entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar, latas de leche, bolsas de fideos y botellas de aceite.
texts.en: Jessica is a hard-working person who sells beer and food, and has a small grocery store where she sells her products. She has belonged to the "Virgen del Rosario" communal bank for several years, and on this occasion needs the loan to buy supplies such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, cans of milk, bags of noodles, and bottles of cooking oil.

loans.use: To buy supplies such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, cans of milk, bags of noodles, and bottles of cooking oil.

loans.name: Mariela

texts.es: Mariela de 32 años de edad es comerciante, de productos de papelería, champú, cremas y ropa en general. Desde hace 2 años dio inicio a su negocio, aprovechando su experiencia adquirida durante diez años, cuando trabajó en una surtidora de papelería. Mariela al ser  indemnizada por la empresa donde trabajaba, invirtió su dinero en útiles escolares, papelería y poco a poco agregó ropa, cosméticos, de acuerdo a lo solicitado por su clientela y se vinculó a empresas multinacionales proveedoras, que ofrecen productos otorgándole una guía especializada o catálogos para hacer las ventas. Su negocio abre sus puertas desde las 6:30 de la mañana y solo hasta las 10 dela noche termina de atender a su clientela. En la actualidad está solicitando un credikiva, financiamiento que hace la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará utiles escolares, productos capilares y de belleza además de ropa  y calzado. Su credikiva tiene como meta mejorar el surtido actualizándolo, para rotar sus inventarios rápidamente con la mercancía que más se vende. Esta es justamente lo que hace que el  credikiva sea una magnifica inversión, pues planea impactar una vez mas su mercado.
texts.en:
Mariela, 32, is a shopkeeper. She sells paper products, shampoo, creams and clothing. 

She started her business 2 years ago taking advantage of the experience she has acquired over ten years working at a paper store.
