texts.es: Maria de 51 años de edad desde hace 3 años decidió establecer en un colegio un pequeño chalet  donde comercializa fruta, agua, golosinas, refrescos, gaseosas, etc. los alumnos la prefieren por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora vender, vive en casa propia con su hijo, Maria ha decidido solicitar un crédito a INTEGRAL  para poder comprar mercadería por mayor y así poder obtener mejores ganancias para tener junto con su hijo una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Maria, age 51, decided three years ago to set up a small snack shop in a school.  There she sells fruit, water, snacks, drinks, soda, etc.  Thanks to her good prices and her friendliness when she makes sales, the students prefer her.  

She lives in her own house with her child.  Maria decided to ask Integral for a loan in order to be able to buy merchandise in bulk and thus get better earnings.  In this way, along with her child, she can have a better quality of life without any kind of limitation.

loans.use: to buy fruit, water, snacks, drinks, soda, etc., in bulk

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es: Marta tiene 48 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 17 y 15 años de edad. Marta se gana la vida por medio de la venta de verduras y plantas ornamentales desde hace 20 años. De esta forma es como junto a su esposo mantienen la economía del hogar y dan a sus hijos lo necesario. Desea reparar el piso y el techo de la vivienda para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, cemento y arena para reparar el techo de la vivienda y para encementar el piso de la misma.
texts.en: Marta is 48 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and their two children, aged 17 and 15. Marta has earned her living by selling vegetables and ornamental plants for 20 years. This is the way that she and her husband pay for the household expenses and give their children what they need. She wants to repair the floor and the roof of her house. That is why she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, cement and sand to repair the roof and put in a cement floor.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, cement and sand to repair the roof on the house and put in a cement floor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to help her grow her coffee crop this season.

loans.name: Teresa  Isabel

texts.es: Teresa de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años, su principal siembra es el maíz, su esposo le ayuda con el trabajo, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, adicional a eso también posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, Teresa esta  solicitando un crédito para su tienda y poder  comprar mas mercadería como golosinas, refrescos, azúcar, sopas, etc. y al mismo tiempo comprar insumos agrícolas para la siembra para poder seguir con su trabajo y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Teresa, age 36, lives in her own house with her husband and her children.  She has worked in agriculture for a number of years.  Her principal crop is corn.  Her husband helps her with the work, selling her produce in the different markets found near where they live.  Besides this, she also has a small store located in their home.  

Teresa is asking for a loan for her store to be able to buy more merchandise such as snacks, drinks, sugar, soups, etc., and at the same time to buy agricultural supplies for her farm.  In this way she can keep up her work and can give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy snacks, drinks, sugar, soups, etc., and also to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.en:
Gulbahor was born in 1972. She is a hardworking and industrious woman. Gulbahor is married and has 4 children. Her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. 

Gulbahor has been busy selling food items in her shop. She has managed this business alone for more than 14 years. She has great experience in this field and has developed the business little by little. Gulbahor wants to expand the assortment of goods she sells in order to attract more customers. She is asking for a loan of 5000 TJS to buy food items to increase her working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy food items to increase her working capital

loans.name: Samantha  Lisbeth

texts.es:
Las manualidades de Samantha tuvieron buena aceptación en la población de Boaco. Esto dio pauta a que se dedicara a la venta de distintos artículos como bisutería, ropa interior y  de segunda mano.  Aunque finalizó sus estudios superiores y cuenta con un trabajo estable, nunca perdió la visión de tener un negocio propio. Gracias al esfuerzo y dedicación, Samantha logró abrir su tienda hoy en día.
Es madre de una niña de cuatro años. Su mamá es quien la apoya en su negocio, también cuenta con los ingresos de su marido, porque viaja constantemente a Canadá por trabajo. Sin embargo el dinero algunas veces no es suficiente y Samantha desea que su pequeña tienda crezca. Por lo tanto buscó otros recursos y través de un financiamiento de KIVA y MiCrédito tendrá capital para invertir en  nuevos productos que atraerán a una  mayor clientela. Solicita el crédito para la compra de: Ropa interior y Bisuteria.
texts.en:
Samantha's crafts were well accepted in the town of Boaco. This led to her selling different items such as jewellery, underwear and second hand clothes. Although she finished her higher level studies and could rely on a steady job, she never lost the vision of having her own business. Thanks to  her efforts and dedication, Samantha was able to open her current shop. 

She is the mother of a four-year-old girl. Samantha's mother supports her in her business. She also has income from her husband because he travels to Canada for work. But sometimes the money is not enough and Samantha wants her little shop to grow. 

Therefore she sought other resources and through financing from Kiva and MiCrédito will have capital to invest in new products that will appeal to a greater number of customers. She is applying for the loan to buy lingerie and jewellery.

loans.use: to buy underwear and jewellery.

loans.name: Meily

texts.en:
Meily runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits. Meily lives in Jakarta, an urban area. Meily is married and living with four people in the family home. 

Meily began working with Ruma three years ago because she wanted to increase her income.  She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business continues, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a machine to make malted milks and to stock up on more products.

loans.name: Jarold Alfonso

texts.es: Jarol tiene 36 años  vive en la comunidad de nombre el Guapotal  dice que aprendió a leer y escribir nada más  porque la situación económica de sus padres no les permitió  poder ponerlo a estudiar  así que  a temprana  edad el aprendió a trabajar y cultivar la tierra ya que trabajaba con su padre y sus hermanos. Paso el tiempo y el realizo su vida y formo su hogar hoy en día  vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos  tienen su propia casa, sus hijos van a la escuela de la comunidad, su esposa realiza los quehaceres del hogar y él se dedica a  cultivar frijoles, maíz y café. En la comunidad no hay energía convencional  así que viven a oscuras  ellos se iluminan por las noches con candiles o lámparas ahora que se presenta la oportunidad de adquirir un crédito para comprar un pequeño sistema solar se siente muy feliz porque podrán tener luz en su vivienda .
texts.en: Jarol is 36 years old. He lives in a community called El Guapotal. He says that he only learned to read and write because his parents' financial situation didn't allow them to put him in school. At a young age, he learned to work the land because he worked with his father and his siblings. Time passed and he lived his life and started his own home. Today he lives with his wife and their three children. They have their own house and their children go to the community school. His wife takes care of the home and he grows beans, corn and coffee. There is no conventional power source in the community so they have no electricity and use candles or oil lamps at night. Now he has the opportunity to acquire a loan to buy a small solar power system. He is very happy because they will be able to have electricity in his home.

loans.use: to buy a solar power system for his house.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 24 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre, su esposa y su hijo,  el se dedica a la venta de fruta y verdura, en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su casa, es una zona muy transitada por esa razón posees clientela fija, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de  frutas y verduras por mayor y asi poder tener mas productos que comercializar y atender mejor a sus clientes ya que de ellos depende que su trabajo salga a flote y asi darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client is 24 years old and lives in his own house with his mother, wife and son. He makes a living selling fruits and vegetables in the market that is close to his house. It is a very busy area and for this reason he has a fixed clientele. With the earnings from his sales he is able to pay for his household expenses.

The client is requesting a loan to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale and thus have more products to commercialize and attend to his customers better, since his business depends on them to stay afloat, and thereby give his family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en:
Rubina is a 30-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. 

She has been doing business tailoring for the past 4 years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband worked alone for their family, they would not be able to meet the expenses of their household and the educational needs of their children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. 

Now she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons and laces. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. Rubina hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all her hard work.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, packs of buttons and laces.

loans.name: Gami

texts.en:
Gami is a 54-year-old married woman. 

She has been doing business selling milk for many years. She has 2 cows. She sells milk along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to allow her to lead a decent life. She has three children; she is very motivated to provide them with good food, health and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. 

Currently, she is in her 6th loan cycle and applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase one more cow. She hopes to increase her sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Iván De Jesús

texts.es:
Iván es un hombre de 58 años que ha tenido que soportar duras pruebas a lo largo de su vida, es un hombre trabajador y perseverante que no se ha dejado derrumbara por los múltiples problemas que ha tenido que enfrentar.
Luego de atravesar por una crisis emocional que le causo el asesinato de uno de sus dos hijos, Iván comenzó con un negocio de comidas que alterna con el oficio de recuperador de residuos metálicos que ejerce desde hace ya bastantes años, generando así un empleo a una hermana que le ayuda con su negocio.
En estos momento necesita un crédito para comprar lotes grandes de residuos metálicos que puede conseguir a precios muy económicos en las grandes fábricas, esto le permitirá aumentar sus ingresos, obtener un poco más de estabilidad y podrá darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Iván es el ejemplo claro de un hombre fuerte, de corazón firme y mirada segura, que tiene claro que el éxito de cualquier negocio es el trabajo duro y la perseverancia
texts.en:
Iván is a 58-year-old man who has had to endure harsh trials throughout his life.  He is a hard-working and persistent man who has not let himself get knocked down by the multiple problems that he has had to face.

After going through an emotional crisis that was caused by the murder of one of his two children, Iván started a food business that he alternates with the job of salvaging scrap metal which he has done for a number of years, thus generating employment for a sister who helps with this business.

At this time, he needs a loan to buy large batches of scrap metal that he can get at very affordable prices from the large factories.  This will allow him to increase his income, achieve a little more stability, and be able to provide a better quality of life for his family.  Iván is a clear example of a strong man, with a strong heart and firm gaze, who is sure that the success of any business is hard work and perseverance.

loans.use: to buy large batches of scrap metal that he can get at very affordable prices.

loans.name: German

texts.es: German de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, desde hace varios años se dedica  a la agricultura siembra maiz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y posee mucha clientela porque su producto es de muy buena calidad ay a buen precio, German esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, semillas, herbicidas, etc.  y mejorar el terreno que es el que muestra la fotografia para realizar sus siembras, y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
German is 33 years old, and he lives in his own house with his wife and two children. He has worked in agriculture for several years, cultivating corn and beans. He sells his produce in the areas that are near his place of residence, and he has many customers because his produce is very high quality, and it is well-priced. 

German is requesting a loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, compost, pest control products, seeds, herbicide, etc. He will also use it to improve the land that is shown in the photograph, in order to carry out his cultivation. In this way, he will achieve better earnings and give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, compost, pest control products, seeds, herbicide, etc., and improve the land.

loans.name: Jose Santiago

texts.es: Jose de 55 años de edad vive solo en casa propia,  desde pequeño trabaja en la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para realizar una buena siembra, cuando ya esta lista la cosecha la almacena en sacos así como muestra la fotografía, para luego salir a comercializarla en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, Jose está solicitando un crédito para la compra de  fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y poder seguir con sus siembras para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Jose, 55 years old, lives alone in his own house. Since he was little, he has worked in farming planting maize and beans and this has given him the necessary experience to produce a good harvest. When the harvest is ready, it is stored in bags as is shown in the photo in order to then take to sell in different markets found near to his residence. Jose is requesting a loan to buy chemical and organic fertilizers, pest control, herbicides, etc. and be able to continue with his plantings in order to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chemical and organic fertilizer, pest control, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is a married woman. She has five children. 

She has been doing business selling milk for the past 10 years. Her business is good enough to allow her to lead a decent life. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her 6th loan cycle and applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR. This will help her to purchase one more buffalo. In this way she will be able to increase her sales and also her profits.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Naheed

texts.en:
Naheed, age 28, is a married woman. She has a business raising and selling livestock. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them at the market for a profit. She earns enough through her business to contribute to the family's income. She also sells milk to generate extra income. 

Naheed needs to improve her business to cover her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase more animals. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she is confident that she can expand her business and income.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Ruqayya

texts.en:
Ruqayya is a 45-year-old married woman who has been selling milk for the past 20 years. She has 1 milking cow, and she sells milk to the people of her locality. Her business is sufficient to provide her with a decent life. 

Ruqayya has two daughters, both of whom are in school. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with a good education, food, and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet their day-to-day living expenses.  

This is Ruqayya's third year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business with Kashf's support. She is requesting a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one buffalo. She hopes to increase her sales and profits.

loans.use: to purchase one buffalo.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra, age 50, is a widow. She has 4 children. She has been in the business of sewing clothes for many years and is very familiar with stitching techniques. At present, Azra enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and residents of the local area. She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operating her business, Azra has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy stocks of threads in different colors and packs of zippers and buttons in order to keep up with increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy threads in different colors and packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Nasrin

texts.en:
Nasrin is a 47-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store for many years, and she has attracted a good number of customers. She is the mother of six children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing, and health. 

Nasrin wants to grow her business, so she has requested a loan of PKR 45,000 to buy packs of salts, biscuits, and beverages to meet the increasing demand for these items at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. Nasrin is in her 4th loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits, and beverages.

loans.name: Sallan

texts.en:
Sallan is a 35-year-old woman. 

She has been running this business selling milk for many years to contribute to the family income. By this time, Sallan has become well-known for providing good-quality milk and earns a good amount of income. 

She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her third loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. Sallan is hopeful that this will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Khtoon

texts.en:
Khtoon is 33 years old and a married woman and mother of four children. 

The man shown in the photo is Khtoon’s son who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Khtoon has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR for her son. He wants to buy new tires and some spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Khtoon is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some spare parts.

loans.name: Aris

texts.en:
Aris runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits. Aris lives in Jakarta, an urban area.  Aris is married and lives with three people in the family house. 

Aris began working with Ruma one year ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business continues, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Emmanuel Group

texts.en:
These women are part of the group called Akotobu and it consists of 4 members, all of whom are women. These entrepreneurs are very humble, hardworking and responsible people with good manners and lots of enthusiasm to improve their lives. 
 
Victoria is a 35-year-old lady living with her husband and her three children. The lady standing second from right is Victoria. Her husband works as a private teacher. She sells fish to help her husband financially. She sells by hawking from house to house and selling to her customers. She has developed a very good relationship with her customers in the town. She likes the fact that she can cater to the needs of the people in her town. Victoria has a plan to grow her business so that she can meet her customers' demands. She also wants to purchase fish from the nearby harbor rather than from the cool store. For this, she has requested a loan to purchase one big carton of fish and sell to customers. Victoria, along with her group members, are requesting a loan amount of GHS 1,600 to serve customers better.

loans.use: To purchase one big carton of fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:

Ahmad began working with Ruma two years ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business continues, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.name: Alicia Raquel

texts.es: Alicia de 30 años es madre soltera  vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, desde hace varios años se dedica a la  venta de especies canela, pimienta, achiote, ajonjolí, etc.  su negocio lo tiene en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, Alicia esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de especies  por mayor y asi seguir con sus ventas y poderle dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Alicia, 30 years old, is a single mother. She lives in her own house with her two children. For several years she has been dedicated to selling spices like cinnamon, pepper, achiote, sesame, etc. She has her business in the market which is found close to her place of residence. Alicia is requesting a loan to buy spices at wholesale and thus continue with her sales and be able to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cinnamon, pepper, achiote, sesame, etc.

loans.name: Salamun

texts.en:
Salamun runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits. Salamun lives in Jakarta, an urban area.  Salamun is married and lives with four people in the family house. 

Salamun began working with Ruma four years ago because he wanted to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business continues, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Soppiyan

texts.en:
Soppiyan runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits. Soppiyan lives in Jakarta, an urban area.  Soppiyan is married and lives with five people in the family house. 

Soppiyan began working with Ruma one month ago because he wants to increase his income.  He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. As the business continues, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en:
Shehnaz is a 36-year-old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully-stocked she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR which she will use to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim has successfully built her business selling milk with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. Previously with the help of Kiva loan she purchased a milking buffalo to increase her sales.  She has a good client base.  

Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is in her 7th loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Clara Elena

texts.es:
Clara es una mujer trabajadora y muy emprendedora, a sus 60 años trabaja incansablemente para darles la mejor calidad de vida a sus 3 hijos.
Ella en estos momentos posee un pequeño negocio de confección de todo tipo de uniformes, habilidad que adquirió después de trabajar gran parte de su vida en diferentes fábricas de confección textil, allí aprendió sobre todo este tema y decidió iniciar con su propio taller hace ya un tiempo.
Ahora la meta de Clara es poder tener su propia línea y marca de ropa y uniformes por eso necesita un crédito de $2.000.000 para comprar insumos como tela, hilos encajes, botones, herramientas de confección, entre otros. Que le permitirán obtener fuerza en su negocio.
El mayor sueño de Clara es tener un taller de confección formalizado y generar empleo a varias personas, pero su mayor desafío son las temporadas en las que la venta de ropa baja sus ventas y eso la afecta directamente, pero con más variedad de productos podrá sostener su negocio en estas épocas difíciles.
texts.en:
Clara is a hard-working and entrepreneurial 60 year old woman who works constantly to provide the highest quality of living to her 3 children. She has at this time a small sewing business making all types of uniforms. She acquired this ability by working the greater part of her life in different fabric factories. She learned everything to do in the field and decided to start her own workshop some time ago.

Now Clara's goal is to have her own line and label of clothing and uniforms. She needs a loan of 2,000 PEN to buy supplies like fabric, thread, lace, buttons, sewing tools, etc. This will allow her to add some momentum to her business.

Clara's main dream is to formalize her workshop and generate employment for several people. Her major challenge are those times when clothing sales are low as this affects her directly. But with more variety of products she can sustain herself in the difficult times.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, lace, buttons, sewing tools, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 25 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida quien trabaja como albañil  y sus dos hijos,  ella se dedica  a la venta y elaboración de tortillas desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora  de vender, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de maíz por quintales y cal para seguir elaborando dichos alimentos y asi tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The client is 25 years old and lives in her own house with her life companion and her two children. Her companion works as a bricklayer. She has made and sold tortillas for several years. Her business is located in her house and she has lots of clients due to her good prices and the friendliness with which she greets her customers. The client has requested a loan to buy corn by the quintal and lime so she can continue to make her food and with her family enjoy a higher standard of living.

loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more food supplies to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cooking supplies that she can sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, salt, onion, maggi cubes (spices), etc., for her business

loans.name: Kiran

texts.en:
Kiran is 28 years old, and is a married woman. The man shown in the photo is Kiran’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now the rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Kiran has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR for her husband. 

He wants to buy new tires and some tools for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Kiran is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and some tools for his vehicle.

loans.name: Abida

texts.en: Abida is a 42-year-old married woman. She has two children. She strives hard to meet their demands that include food, clothing, and health. Her husband is employed at a small restaurant. His income is not sufficient to meet the daily expenditures of the family. That is why she started her business sewing clothes to contribute to the family income. She is well familiar with the stitching techniques. At the present time, she enjoys a great client list and has gained a lot of appreciation and popularity in her community. To help her continue the operations of her business, she requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy stock of threads in different colors and packs of needles, ribbons and zippers to meet up with the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock of threads in different colors and packs of needles, ribbons and zippers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soft drinks and provisions to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal bags for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, sand, re-bar and beams.

loans.name: Ishrat

texts.en: Ishrat is a 38-year-old married woman. She has been running a beauty parlor for many years. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. Through providing the best services, she has become very famous on her street. In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetic products for the parlor.  For this reason, she applied for a loan of 55,000 PKR to buy hair care products, skin products and bleaching and whitening creams in large quantities. She is hopeful to cater to more customers time after time.  She dreams of expanding her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and bleaching and whitening creams in large quantities.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en: Uzma is a 41-year-old married woman. She, along with her husband (also shown in the photo), are in the business of manufacturing artificial jewelry and have been for many years. The business has great potential for growth and Uzma is actively helping her husband as this business is the only source of income for them. By this time, they have attained a good number of customers. In order to meet the orders on time and boost their sales, Uzma requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to purchase raw material such as silver, gold and dozens of artificial gems and pearls. She hopes to increase their net income and dreams of improving their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as silver, gold and dozens of artificial gems and pearls.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en: Shazia is a 30-year-old married woman. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing it for the past three years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue the operations of her business, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy stock of threads in different colors and packs of zippers, buttons and laces to keep up with the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock of threads in different colors and packs of zippers, buttons and laces.

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is a separated woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Faith is 39 years old and one of her children is currently in school. Faith has a ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years. 

Faith has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stock of clothing, like blouses, shorts, and shoes, to sell. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of ready-to-wear clothes to sell

loans.name: Syuzanna

texts.en:
Syuzanna is a farmer. She lives with her husband and three children. The village where the family lives is located in the Lori region, which is famous for its beautiful nature. 

Syuzanna and her husband run a farm. They keep livestock (two cows, chickens and four calves), as well as grow different types of fruit trees. Syuzanna's husband also works as a herdsman. 

Realizing how important agribusiness is for their family, Syuzanna applied for this loan. The loan of 1,500 USD will greatly help her to purchase seed potatoes and fertilizer and enlarge her cultivation.

loans.use: to buy for seed potatoes and fertilizer

loans.name: Fareeda

texts.en: Fareeda, a 48-year-old married woman, runs a small boutique at home to provide for her family. She purchases cloth from the market at low prices, sews and then sells it to the people of her locality.  She always has a great product selection to offer, and she earns a good income that contributes to her family's well-being. For the improvement of her business, Fareeda has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread in various colors. These purchases will allow her to fulfill the demands of her customers on time. With a good credit history, this will be Fareeda’s 8th loan. She dreams of providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread in various colors.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more ‘gari’ to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: A sus 54 años de edad visualizamos a Doña Rosario llena de vida y con ganas de seguir trabajando. Soltera y con un hijo ya independiente vemos en su rostro las ganas de salir adelante. Doña Rosario tiene 15 años de dedicarse a la venta de Ropa, Zapatos y Cosméticos, y hasta el día de hoy le ha ido muy bien y ha logrado mantenerlo. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de Ropa, Zapatos y cosméticos. Ella se encuentra segura de que con el crédito lograra satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Sus planes futuros son expandirse a otros mercados en distintos lugares de la ciudad.
texts.en:
At 54 years old, Doña Rosario appears full of life and a desire to keep working. Single, and with one child who is now independent, her desire to get ahead can be seen in her face. 

Rosario has been selling clothing, shoes, and cosmetics for 15 years; so far, this business has gone well for her and she has been able to keep it going. She is requesting a loan to buy clothing, shoes, and cosmetics. She feels sure that with the loan, she will be able to satisfy customer demand. Her future plans are to expand to other markets in different parts of the city.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Salif

texts.fr:
Monsieur SALIF est né en Octobre 1962, marié et père de 13 enfants il réside chez son père à MISSIRIKORO un des  quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso  troisième région administrative de la république du Mali.
Monsieur SALIF après avoir mené beaucoup d’activité sans succès,  s’est initié des  activités d’achat et de vente de fruits  ( orange, banane, mangue, ananas, avocat, etc) il y'a maintenant 6 ans. Dans le souci de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante, il décida de rejoindre l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso il ya maintenant deux ans et avec qui il est à son quatrième prêt individuel. Les 3 prêts antérieurs ont été correctement remboursés. 
Il compte avec ce quatrième prêt  acheter des quantités importantes de fruits ( orange, banane, mangue et ananas) en provenance des localités environnantes de Sikasso. Ces marchandises sont d’abord stockées dans son magasin afin d’êtres revendues en détail  sur le marché et à Sofara ( région de MOPTI) à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit.
Il envisage réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel de 170 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, contribuer aux dépenses familiales et payer les intérêts de son prêt.
texts.en:
Salif, who was born in October 1962, is married and father to 13 children. He lives in his father's house in Missirikoro, one of the working class districts of the town of Sikasso, the Republic of Mali's third administrative region.

Salif has had many unsuccessful activities, but launched himself into buying and selling fruit (oranges, bananas, mangos, pineapple, avocados, etc) six years ago. With a view to better satisfying his ever-growing customer base, he decided to join the microfinance institution, Soro Yiriwaso, two years ago and is on his fourth individual loan. The three previous loans have been repaid in full.

With this fourth loan he is planning to buy significant quantities of fruits (oranges, bananas, mangos and pineapples) coming from Sikasso's surrounding towns. These goods are initially stocked in his shop so that they can then be sold on a retail basis in the market and in Sofara (in the Mopti region) to a customer base made up of men and women, for cash and on credit.

Thanks to this loan he expects to make an average monthly profit of 170,000FCFA, which will be used to expand his business, contribute to the household outgoings and to pay the interest on his loan.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Abad

texts.es: Abad nació en la comunidad de Huarancca el distrito de Colquepata de la provincia de Paucartambo al sur de la ciudad del Cusco, él tiene 60 años de edad  y es una persona responsable que se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, él tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo, habas y otras productos y también tiene varios ganados que los hace engordar para luego venderlos en las ferias, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un ganado, él agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo  y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Abad nació en la comunidad de Huarancca el distrito de Colquepata de la provincia de Paucartambo al sur de la ciudad del Cusco, él tiene 60 años de edad  y es una persona responsable que se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, él tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo, habas y otras productos y también tiene varios ganados que los hace engordar para luego venderlos en las ferias, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un ganado, él agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo  y se compromete a pagar sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.

loans.use: para comprar un ganado.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients, utensils, and a kitchen cabinet.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es:
La máxima fuente de inspiración de Cándida es su hija de dos años. Es por ella que inició el negocio de ventas de ropa interior, camisetas y shorts en la tienda de sus padres, que está situada en los alrededores del mercado de la ciudad. Trabajó por corto tiempo y con las prestaciones recibidas de su liquidación, invirtió en estos artículos con el fin de comercializarlos  con las personas que visitan la zona.  Diariamente recibe a sus clientes con una sonrisa contagiosa.
Cándida solicitó un préstamo para la compra de: Camisetas, Shorts, Camisolines entre otros, con el propósito de  ofrecerle  a  su  clientela  fiel una  gran variedad  de prendas  de vestir.  Su ilusión es conseguir su propio espacio dentro del mercado,  de esa manera obtendrá  beneficios para su familia. Asimismo, contará  con ahorros, con estabilidad económica y  podrá optar por una vivienda.  Gracias al apoyo de esta institución es posible que logre sus metas.
texts.en:
Cándida main source of motivation is her two year old daughter. It is because of her that she opened her business selling undergarments, nighties and shorts in her parents' store that is located by the city market. She worked for a short time and with the money she received as a severance package she invested in these articles with the goal of selling them to people visiting the area. Cándida receives her clients daily with a smile.

The loan she is requesting is to buy t-shirts, shorts, nighties, etc. with the aim of providing her clientele with a greater variety of clothing. Her dream is to get her own commercial space within the market and in this way generate benefits for her family. Also she can save money with economic stability and might buy a house. Thanks to the help from this institution she can strive to obtain her goals.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, shorts, nighties, etc.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en:
Uzma, age 35, is a vigorous married lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to lack of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of threads in different colors, packs of lace, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she can generate a healthier source of income. She is in her third loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy thread, laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Suriya

texts.en:
Suriya is 57 years old, a married woman and the mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Suriya’s son, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Suriya has applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR for her son. He wants to buy new tires and some spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Suriya is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and spare auto parts.

loans.name: Kasor

texts.en:
Kasor is a 41-year-old married lady and has run a small general store in her community for many years with her husband (also shown in the photo).  She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To stock her store more fully she has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR, which she will use to buy rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she will be able to meet increasing demands consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cement and jewelry to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es: Rosalina de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica  a la  vende y elaboración de hamacas, comercializa sus productos por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran salir adelante con los gasto del hogar, Rosalina esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos y nylon de colores y los materiales necesarios para seguir elaborando dichas hamacas y obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosalina, 46, lives in her own house with her two children and her husband.  She earns a living making and selling hammocks.  She sells her products in the various neighborhoods near her home.

Rosalina's requesting a loan to buy thread and nylon in a variety of colors and the materials she needs.  She's going to keep on making hammocks so she can earn better profits and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy thread, nylon, and other materials

loans.name: Jose Neftali

texts.es: Jose de 35 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en las agencias de  compra-venta de granos básicos, vive en casa propia  con su compañera de vida y su hijo menor de edad, Jose esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi seguir con sus siembras que le dejan buenas ganancias, para poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
José, 35, has earned a living for several years growing corn and beans.  He sells his products in distribution centers that buy and sell basic grains.  He lives in his own house with his life partner and his youngest child.

José's requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, soil amendments, pest controls, herbicide, and other agricultural inputs.  He'll keep on growing what earns him a good profit so he can provide his family with better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, soil amendments, pest controls, herbicide, etc.

loans.name: Ruth Marina

texts.es:
Con el avance de la tecnología las personas tienen la necesidad de estar conectados a la Internet, ya sea para cumplir responsabilidades u obligaciones de sus estudios o el trabajo, tal es el caso de Ruth. Ella tiene 18 años de edad, es una joven inteligente y emprendedora, cursa la carrera de Ingeniera Electrónica, lo cual es todo para ella. Uno de sus sueños es profesionalizarse, cuenta con el apoyo de sus padres y una tía, a los que anhela enorgullecer.  
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de una computadora portátil, la que le servirá para la elaboración de proyectos y entrega inmediata de sus trabajos por Internet, lo que la mantendrá conectada y activa en su carrera. Ella deposita su fe en financiamiento que brinda Kiva y MiCrédito, puesto que será un soporte para el cumplimiento de una de sus metas, culminar con éxito la carrera. En un futuro planea seguir estudiando, ya que para ella los estudios son la base de su formación.
texts.en:
With advances in technology, it is important to have an Internet connection to fulfill responsibilities for work and school. This is the case for Ruth, who is 18. She is an intelligent and enterprising young woman studying Electronic Engineering, which means everything to her. One of her dreams is to become a professional. She is helped by her parents and an aunt, who she wants to make proud.

She is requesting a loan to buy a laptop, which will allow her to create projects and submit her work right away via Internet. This will keep her active and connected in her career. She puts her faith in the financing provided by Kiva and MiCrédito, which will support her in her goals and help her complete her degree successfully. In the future, she plans to keep studying because she believes that an education is the foundation of her training.

loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 27 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos quienes estudian actualmente, ella posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que comercializa, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: refrescos, golosinas, sopas, granos básicos, pan dulce, aceites, etc. y así seguir con su trabajo para darle a sus hijos lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: This client, 27, is a single mother who lives in her own home with her two sons, who are in school. She has a store in her home, and she has many customers because of the variety of products she sells. This client is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as drinks, sweets, soup, basic grains, sweet bread, oil, and more. This will allow her to keep working so she can give her children everything they need, without limitations.

loans.use: to buy drinks, sweets, soup, basic grains, sweet bread, oils, and more.

loans.name: María Lucrecia

texts.es:
La Señorita. María es una socia que desde hace dos años forma parte del grupo de crédito Génesis, en este grupo ha establecido una hermosa amistad con todas las socias, todas se apoyan mutuamente, en cada reunión salen de la rutina diaria de su trabajo ya que pueden platicar de varios temas de su interés, Vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es muy visitada por su centro histórico el cual le dio el nombre Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad en Diciembre de 1999, se encuentra bañada por 4 ríos, su cultura, sus tradiciones y su gastronomía cautivan a propios y extraños.
La Señorita. María tiene 29 años de edad, es soltera y vive con su madre, en casa comparte los gatos del hogar, la casa es propiedad de su madre.
Doña María ejerce su profesión de contadora de una manera libre, también en casa se dedica a la cría de pollos, le va bien en el negocio y espera crecer aun más en el negocio. Su crédito es para la compra de pollos. Su meta es especializarse en su profesión.
texts.en:
María has been a member of Génesis Communal Bank for two years.  She has established warm friendships with all the members, who help each other mutually.  In their meetings they're able to get out of their daily routines and talk about a variety of topics of mutual interest.

She lives in the city of Cuenca, which is very popular because of its historic core, named a World Heritage Site in December 1999.  Four rivers run through the city, where the culture, traditions, and cuisine of Cuenca attract natives and strangers.

María, 29, is single and lives with her mother. Her mother owns the house, and María shares the household expenses.

María's a freelance accountant.  She also raises chickens at home.  The business is going well for her and she hopes to grow even more.

Her loan is to buy chickens. Her goal is to specialize in her profession.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is 48 years old and married with three children.

Loreta works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 17000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of snack foods, coffee, sugar, milk, canned goods, detergent soap and other items to sell.

Loreta has borrowed and paid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 3 years, and she earns additional income from food vending.

Loreta aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of snack foods, coffee, sugar, milk, canned goods, detergent soap and other items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, fish, charcoal, and other items.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana 50 años posee una ferretería desde hace 10 años, vive en casa propia esposo y sus 3 hijos, sus  2 hijos menores estudia y el mayor trabaja y ayuda en los gastos del hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mercadería como: clavos, pinturas, herramientas, focos, lámparas, cementos, y demás mercadería todo por mayor, y asi continuar con sus ventas y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana, 50 years old, has had a hardware store for 10 years. She lives in her own home with her husband and 3 children. Her 2 younger children go to school, and the oldest one works and helps with household expenses.

Ana is applying for a loan to buy merchandise such as: nails, paints, tools, lightbulbs, lamps, cements, and other wholesale merchandise, so that she can continue with her sales and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy nails, paints, tools, lightbulbs, lamps, cements and other wholesale merchandise.

loans.name: Sri

texts.en:
Sri runs a small stall selling toys and mobile phone airtime credits. She lives in Jakarta, an urban area. Sri is married and living with three people in the family home. 

Sri began working with Ruma 1 year ago because she wanted to increase her income. She feels really excited to expand her business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments. As the business expands, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: to process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Patricia

texts.es:
Patricia es una mujer emprendedora y pujante que conoce el significado del trabajo duro ya que hace más de 15 años se gana la vida vendiendo café, tinto, aromáticas y todo tipo de bebidas en el sector donde vive.
Su mayor anhelo es poder ver a sus 3 hijos graduados y convertidos en unos profesionales, por eso labora en horarios muy extendidos.
Ella necesita un crédito de $2.100.000 para comprar surtido, un termo para café y una lámpara para iluminar su chaza.
Ella es el claro ejemplo de que las mujeres no son el sexo débil y que el amor de una madre supera cualquier adversidad que se presente en la vida.
texts.en:
Patricia is an enterprising and vigorous woman who knows what hard work is. She makes her living selling coffee, tinto (strong Colombian style coffee), herbal teas and all kinds of drinks in the area she lives. Her greatest dream is to see her 3 children graduate and become professionals. For this she works very long hours.

She needs a loan of $2,100 to buy stock, a coffee thermos and a lamp to light her cart. She is a clear example of a woman who is not the weaker sex and someone that with the love of a mother can overcome any obstacle that life presents.

loans.use: to buy supplies, a thermos for coffee and a lamp to light her cart.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruit wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Maria vive en casa propia con sus 3 hijos, el mayor de ellos trabaja y ayuda en los gastos del hogar,  ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado, en un lugar muy transitado, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y al amabilidad que tiene a la hora de  vender, Maria está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa por mayor para surtir con mas mercadería supuesto de ropa y asi obtener mejores ganancia  y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Maria lives in her own house with her three children.  The oldest child works and helps with the household expenses.  She sells clothes.  Her business is located at a very busy place at the market.  She has a lot of customers because of the good prices and the kindness she displays when selling.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy more clothes wholesale in order to stock her clothing stand with more merchandise.  This way she will get better earnings and give her family better financial security without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy more clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Kaliman

texts.ru: Калиман 47 лет, замужем, 3 детей, образование - среднее. Калиман работает в доме интернате санитаркой. Коллеги по работе описывают ее как: ответственного, целеустремленного, и доброжелательного человека.Семья у Калиман очень дружная, отношения в семье хорошие. Супруг и дети помогают по хозяйству. Калиман в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи, с 2004 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 30,000 сом (KGS). Упорство и трудолюбие Калиман позволили ей развить свой бизнес до: 2 дойных коров и 7 овец. Ее сельскохозяйственная деятельность приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, в том числе от продажи молока, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Калиман обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом на покупку коров. Доходы от кредита Калиман планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства, а также хочет отремонтировать дом и женить младшего сына.
texts.en:
Kaliman is 47 and married with three children. She has a high school education and works as an orderly in a care home. Her colleagues describe her as a responsible, purposeful and kind person. Her family is very happy and have good relationships with one another. Her husband and children help around the house. 

Since 2004, Kaliman has been working in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began with 30,000 KGS. Her persistence and hard work allowed her to develop her business so that she now has two milking cows and seven sheep, which bring in about 10,000 KGS per month including sales of milk, a sum which covers her family's everyday expenses and needs, including food. With the goal of further developing her business, Kaliman has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan to purchase cows. She plans to invest profits from the loan into further expanding her business and wants to renovate her house and cover her youngest son's wedding costs.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma 60 años vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil, su  hija y dos nietos, ella posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, tiene mucha variedad de productos por eso posee mucha clientela, Irma está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como: granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, sopas, café, pan dulce, etc. y así seguir con su negocio y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Irma, age 60, lives in her own house with her husband, who works as a bricklayer, her daughter, and two grandchildren.  She has had a store at her house for several years.  She has a great variety of products, and that is why she has a lot of clientele.

Irma is requesting a loan to buy more products like basic grains, soft drinks, candy, soup, coffee, and sweet breads, etc.  This way she will continue with her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soft drinks, candy, soup, coffee, and sweet breads, etc.

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda is 49 years old and married with three children.
She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Luzminda is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.
Luzminda has been farming sugarcane for one year, and she also earns additional income from a general store.
She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marilyn is 29 years old and has four children who are in school.
Marilyn has a general store business in the Philippines. Marilyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.
Marilyn has been in this business for five years. In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Gulbara

texts.ru: Гульбаре 50 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Старшая дочь-студентка, остальные учатся в школе.  У Гульбары- среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Гульбара занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав в 1993 году с 1,500 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Гульбары, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 3 дойные коровы, 2 теленка, 15 овец и 10 коз. Для содержания скота есть просторный сарай, корм и сено также заготовлены. Дополнительно Гульбара со своей семьей занимается полеводством, выращивают в основном картофель, кукурузу, клевер для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульбара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупки коров, часть средств она потратит на покупку телят. Гульбара намерена увеличить поголовье скота, что приведет к увеличению капитала семьи и позволит обеспечит детям достойное будущее.
texts.en:
Gulbara is 50 and married with four children. Her oldest daughter is a university student and the remaining children are still in grade school. Gulbara has a high school education and works in agriculture and animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she started in 1993 with 1,500 KGS. Thanks to her hard work and purposefulness, she now has three milking cows, two calves, 15 sheep and 10 goats, as well as a shed for keeping her livestock in and plenty of food and hay. Gulbara and her family also farm; they primarily grow potatoes, corn and clover both for their own use and for sale. Their total monthly income is 10,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Gulbara has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan to purchase cows and calves. She intends to increase the number of livestock she has, which will improve her family's financial situation and allow them to improve their children's future.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is 43 years old and married with two children.
She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Mercedita is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.
Mercedita has been farming sugarcane for 10 years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.
She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bananas, peanuts, and oranges to increase her business.

loans.name: Nisel

texts.en:
Nisel is 32 years old and married with four children.
She earns a living by farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Nisel is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.
Nisel has been farming sugarcane for two years and also earns additional income from a general store.
She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Robin

texts.en:
Robin runs a small stall selling mobile phone airtime credits. He lives in Jakarta, an urban area. Robin is single.

Robin began working with Ruma 4 years ago because he wanted to increase his income. He feels really excited to expand his business selling mobile phone airtime credits and processing bill payments. As the business expands, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: to process more airtime and bill payment transactions on a weekly basis

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cold drinks and ingredients in bulk for her cookery business.

loans.name: Fidel Armando

texts.es: Fidel 37 años se dedica desde hace varios años se dedica a la  venta de sorbetes, lo hace de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados y colonias, vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su compañera de vida, Fidel está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas cajas de sorbetes así como muestra la fotografía para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fidel is 37 years old and for several years has sold ice-cream. He does this as a street vendor in the different markets and neighborhoods. He lives in his own house with his two children and his life companion.

Fidel is requesting a loan to buy more cases of ice cream as shown in the photo to continue with his work. This is his only source of income and he wants to provide his family with a better quality of living.

loans.use: to buy more cases of ice-cream.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 44 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living raising pigs in the Philippines. Susana requests 17,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Susana has raised pigs for 3 years and earns additional income  buying and selling charcoal.

She works tirelessly to attain her dream which is to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamin for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flour, oil, and sugar for her business.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is a 40-year-old married woman with six children. Three children attend school.

Alma is in the agricultural business and raises pigs. Alma requests 11,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Alma has raised pigs for 5 years and has previously borrowed 5 times from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Alma would like to save enough money to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna lives with her two sons in the village of Hoktember. She is a widow.

The three of them run a farm that has a pig and 11 piglets.  They also grow wheat, tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers. 

Anna requests 2,000 USD to purchase fuel, fertilizer and seeds. This will support Anna's goal to further develop her farm. 

The entire family waits for support.

loans.use: to pay for fuel, fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of 13 children, Erlinda works hard to support her family.

She has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from raising pigs. Erlinda is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase additional containers of coconut wine to sell.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 20 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Ahed

texts.en: Ahed is 19 years old. He lives with his family, which consists of seven members, in Irbid-Jordan. His father is a retired man. Ahed is a university student majoring in Physiological Guidance. He is in his second year. He is planning to work in his field of study after graduation in order to support his family financially, but he doesn't have enough money to do so. For this reason, he has applied for this education loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cooking supplies to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, palm oil and bulk quantities of chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more food ingredients such as fish, pepper, vita, oil, and onions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more gari in bulk to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used clothing for her business.

loans.name: Anwar

texts.en:
Anwar is 20 years old. She lives in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her brother and her parents. Anwar is studying nutrition technology and is in her second year of a university program. 

Anwar is requesting a loan to pay her upcoming semester fees. She is planning to continue her studies and work in her field after graduation to start helping her family as they are currently facing a financial crisis.

loans.use: to pay her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy palm oil and ‘gari’ in bulk

loans.name: Ciprian

texts.es: El señor Ciprian tiene 48 años de edad vive actualmente con su conyugue y tiene 2 hijos que dependen de sus ingresos,los mismos se encuentran estudiando en la ciudad de Monteagudo, cuenta con una casa propia de condiciones humildes. Su principal actividad es el cultivo de maíz y el cultivo de frejol, trabaja arduamente para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, ropa, servicios básicos y otros gastos que incurren en su hogar. Ya que no tiene muchos recursos económicos requiere un crédito para que pueda realizar la compra de insumos y preparación de terreno agrícola para siembra de frejol. Con esta compra el cliente podrá realizar la siembra de 3 hectáreas de frejol y así podrá aumentar sus ingresos para mantener a su familia y mejorar las condiciones de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Ciprian is 48 years old. He currently lives with his wife, and has 2 children that depend on his income, who are studying in the city of Monteagudo. He owns his modest home. His main business is growing corn and growing beans. He works arduously to cover the expenses of food, clothing, basic utilities and other expenses incurred by the household. 

Since he doesn't have many economic resources, he needs a loan to be able to purchase supplies and prepare the farm land to plant beans. With this purchase, the client will be able to plant 3 hectares of beans and in that way be able to increase his income to support his family and improve the living conditions in his home.

loans.use: To buy supplies and prepare the farm land

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more supplies in bulk for her business so that she can sell them at a profit.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years now.

Gloria requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

In the future, Gloria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.fr: Elisabeth est une femme de 40 ans mariée mère de famille.  Elle est commerçante et fait la vente en détail et en gros des vivres frais (tomate et piment) en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 17 ans. Elle a une bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Mais elle se retrouve constamment en rupture de stock parce qu'elle est obligée de faire écouler tous le stock pour pouvoir s'en procurer à nouveau ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital. Elle souhaitera acheter les cajots de tomate et les filets de piment pour avoir un bon stock ce qui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande constante de sa clientèle et d'éviter les ruptures de stocks et d'augmenter ses bénéfices. Elle économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Elisabeth is a 40-year-old, married mother. She has been buying and selling seasonal, fresh foodstuffs (tomatoes and peppers) in small quantity and in bulk for 17 years now. She sells her goods at a local market. She knows her suppliers and her customers quite well. She acquired her customers over time thanks to her experience in this line of work. But she often finds herself out of stock, since she has to sell all of her goods before she can restock, due her small amount of capital. She wants to buy crates of tomatoes and bags of peppers so that she will be well stocked and better able to meet the demand of her customers. Doing so will also prevent her from running out of stock and will help her increase her profits. She will use the profits not only to expand her business but also to support her family.

loans.use: to buy crates of tomatoes and bags of peppers

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Sahar is a 23-year-old lady living in a sector in Jordan called Irbid with her family, consisting of four members. She is a university student majoring in translation. She is in her third year. 

She is planning to work in her study field after graduation in order to start helping her family financially. But her family is currently facing a financial crisis, which is not helping them to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a 44-year-old businesswoman who has been successfully running a corn and cassava dough business at her residence for twenty years. This has been her source of income. She is single and stays alone in the Teshie district in Ghana.  

With the requested Kiva loan, Mercy is planning to make bulk purchases of corn and cassava dough so that the volume of her sales will increase, and profits as well. 

With the additional profits, she aspires to expand her business. She also hopes to pay fees for her young sisters, who are staying with their mother.

loans.use: to purchase corn and cassava dough so that the volume of her sales will increase, and her profits as well.

loans.name: Haneen

texts.en:
Haneen is a 22-year-old lady living in a sector in Jordan called Zarqa with her family, which consists of ten members. She is a university student majoring in computer information systems. She is in her fourth year. 

She is planning to work in her study field after graduation in order to start helping her family financially. But her family is currently facing financial a crisis, which is not helping them to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree is a 32-year-old married woman with two children, who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Desiree has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for four years. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Desiree would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Hend

texts.en: Hend is a 29-year-old married lady living in a sector of Jordan called Dair Alla with her husband and her children. She is a university student majoring in computer information systems, and she is in her second year. She is planning to work in her field of study after graduation in order to start helping her husband financially. But her husband is currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping him to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of this, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Ancelmo

texts.es: Ancelmo es viudo y no tiene hijos. Ancelmo vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento, paga el alquiler de la vivienda. Ancelmo es zapatero y necesita credito para comprar una máquina que le ayude en su oficio
texts.en: Ancelmo is a widower and has no children. He lives in El Alto in a house constructed of bricks and cement, paying rent for the dwelling. Ancelmo is a shoe repairman and he needs a loan to purchase a machine that will help him in his trade.

loans.use: buy a machine for his shoe repair business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dry fish, dry pepper, used clothing, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is a 20-year-old lady living in a rented house in a sector of Jordan called Zarqa with her family consisting of eight members. She is a university student majoring in English Language, and she is in her second year. She is planning to work in her field of study after graduation in order to start helping her family financially. But they are currently facing a financial crisis which is not helping them to pay for her upcoming semester fees. Because of this, she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, jerky, freeze-dried potatoes, potatoes, and other foods at wholesale.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela tiene dos hijos y vive con su madre en la ciudad de La Paz. La familia vive en una casa de adobe y tiene que pagar un alquiler. La vivienda solo tiene servicio de luz y hace algún tiempo un automovil se estrelló en la casa ocasionando daños graves al frontis Estela trabaja como camarera en una heladeria.
