Necesita credito para hacer refacciones y terminar una vivienda familiar a la que espera mudarse pronto, aunque la mamá también trabaja, lo que ambas ganan no alcanza, por eso, ella necesita el préstamo.
texts.en: Estela has two children and lives in the city of La Paz. The family lives in an adobe house and has to pay rent. The house has only electricity, and a while back a car crashed into it, causing major damage to the facade. Estela works as a server in an ice cream shop. She needs a loan to refurbish and finish construction on a home for her family that she hopes to move to soon. Though her mother also works, the two of them do not earn enough to cover their expenses, so she needs the loan.

loans.use: to refurbish and finish building a family home.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam es una persona  trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica principal es la venta ropa, ella es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en uno de los bancos comunales de la Asociación Arariwa y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ropa como camisas, pantalones, blusas para esta campaña por el día de la madre, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Miriam is a hardworking, entrepreneurial person who is pushing to help her family get ahead in life. She makes a living selling clothing. Because she is very responsible, she was invited to join one of the Asociación Arariwa's village banks. She needs this loan to buy clothing such as shirts, pants, and blouses for Mother's Day. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to paying it off responsibly each month.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as shirts, pants, and blouses for Mother's Day.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia vive en concubinato desde hace 6 años y tiene dos hijos. Lidia vive en la comunidad de Churuhata Belen en una casa de adobe que es de su propiedad y solo cuenta con luz.  Lidia y su familia no tienen agua ni alcantarillado, asimismo, la construcción es muy precaria. Lidia se dedica a la elaboración de quesos ella ordeña sus vacas en la madrugada cuando el frío es intenso. Lidia necesita comprar una vaca lechera para incrementar su produccion de quesos. Aunque su compañero trabaja como albañil, la familia no gana lo suficiente, por lo que necesitan su ayuda
texts.en: Lidia has been living with her partner for six years and has two children. She lives in the village of Churuhata Belen in a rustic adobe house she owns that has electricity but no running water or sewage. Lidia makes a living making cheese. She milks her cows at dawn when the cold is very intense. Lidia needs to buy a dairy cow to increase her cheese production. Although her partner works as a bricklayer, the family does not earn enough, so they need your help.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase her cheese production.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es casado y tiene 4 hijos. Juan vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde debe pagar un alquiler Juan es empleado publico pero su esposa tiene un negocio de venta de perfumes por catalogo. Juan quiere credito para ayudar al negocio de su esposa el préstamo sera usado para comprar mayor cantidad de perfumes. En la foto aparece Juan con su esposa y uno de sus hijos
texts.en:
Juan is married and has 4 children. He lives in El Alto in a brick and cement house that they must rent. Juan is a public employ but his wife has a business selling perfumes by catalog.

Juan desires a loan to help his wife's business. The loan will be used to purchase a larger quantity of perfumes.

In the photo, Juan appears with his wife and one of their children.

loans.use: buy perfumes for his wife's catalog sales business.

loans.name: Yony

texts.es: Yony es una mujer trabajadora y se dedica a la venta de carne en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Paucartambo, ella continua participando en el banco comunal “Señor de Coyllority” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar más carne de cordero, pescado, res y pollo, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Yony is a hardworking woman who sells meat in one of the markets in the city of Paucartambo. She is still part of the Señor de Coyllority village bank, and she is requesting this loan to buy more lamb, fish, and chicken. She is grateful for the loan and is committed to paying it off very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy more lamb, fish, and chicken.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia es casada y tiene dos hijos. Ella vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Lucia se dedica a la elaboración de ropa para bebé por lo que necesita un credito para comprar materiales (lana, hilos, cintas, etc) para hacer una mayor cantidad de atuendos para bebe como gorros, mitones, pantalones, etc. Por el momento Lucia es la unica fuente de ingresos en el hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda En la foto Lucia aparece con su mercancía y detrás de ella esta uno de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lucia is married and has 2 children. She lives in El Alto in a brick and cement house which is her own property. Lucia is dedicated to making baby clothing and for that purpose, she needs a loan to purchase materials (wool, thread, ribbons, etc.) to make a larger quantity of baby attire, such a caps, mittens, pants, etc. 

For the present, Lucia is the only source of income in the home. So, she needs the help.

In the photo, Lucia appears with her merchandise and behind her is one of her children.

loans.use: buy materials (wool, thread, ribbons) to make a larger quantity of baby clothes.

loans.name: Sebastian

texts.es: Sebastian es viudo y tiene 2 hijos con los que vive en El Alto, en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad Sebastian es costurero y necesita credito para potenciar su negocio, con el dinero piensa comprar entretela, forros, bolsas de cierres, paquetes de botones, etc Sebastian es la unica fuente de ingresos en el hogar por lo que necesita su ayuda.
texts.en:
Sebastian is a widower and has 2 children who live with him in El Alto in his house of brick and cement, which he owns. 

Sebastian is a tailer and needs this loan to expand his business. With the money, he plans to purchase inner lining, lining, boxes of zippers, packets of buttons, etc.

Sebastian is the only source of income in the home and that is why he needs the help.

loans.use: buy inner lining, lining, boxes of zippers, and boxes of buttons for his sewing business.

loans.name: Delma

texts.en:
Delma is 61 years old and is married with one child. Delma works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines. Delma has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, coffee, soft-drinks shampoo and other groceries. She has requested a loan of PHP 29,500 through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Delma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Zaruhi

texts.en:
Zaruhi was born and lives in the village Vedi which is in the Ararat region. Zaruhi has two children: a 19-year-old daughter and a 23-year-old son. 

The whole family is engaged in farming activities. They breed pigs and piglets and also own arable land where they cultivate tomatoes and grow fruit trees.

Zaruhi requested this loan of  $1500 to be able to improve her farm. The grape orchard that the family has is very old. Therefore, Zaruhi asks this loan to be able to purchase wires for the grape orchard. The loan will also be used at purchasing fertilizer for land cultivation. 

Zaruhi and her whole family will be very grateful if lenders support their agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for wires for grape orchard and fertilizer for land cultivation

loans.name: Maysoon

texts.en:
Because Maysoon is a conservative woman, she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. 

Maysoon was born in in 1971. She is a married woman and a mother of four. Her husband is the only provider for the family. He owns a mini market that he has established one year ago. He started his project selling a small amount of food products. Now he is planning to expand it in order to raise his profits so that he will be able to cover his childrens needs. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, Maysoon has applied for this loan to support him.

loans.use: to buy more food products for her husband's store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil and charcoal to enlarge her sales.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 19 years old. He lives with his family, which consists of eight members, in Irbid, Jordan. He is a university student majoring in Business Administration. He is in his first year. 

Mohammad is planning to work in his study field after graduation in order to support his family financially. But he doesn't have enough money to continue. For this reason, he has applied for this education loan.

loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Muna

texts.en:
Muna is a conservative lady, so she asked her son to take her place in the picture. Muna was born in 1970. She is a mother of six girls and a boy. Her husband is a retired man who currently works as a driver. 

Her son Salama, who is appearing in the picture, is a university student. Muna wants to support her son in paying the upcoming semester fees of his study. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. Because of that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To pay for her sons' upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Liliane

texts.fr: Liliane est une jeune femme qui a un dépôt de boisson avec un volet restauration dans un quartier de la place depuis 7 ans déjà.Elle sollicite un crédit qui lui permettra d'augmenter son stock de boissons et même d'aliments à cuisiner tout en espérant voir augmenter le degré de satisfaction de sa clientèle qui aura dorénavant à l'aide du crédit obtenu une diversité d'offre de produits.les bénéfices obtenus à satisfaire avec beaucoup d'aisance les besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Liliane is a young woman who owns a beverage stand that also offers some food. It is located in a local neighborhood, and she has owned it for seven years.

She is requesting a loan to allow her to increase her stock of beverages as well as her store of cooking supplies. She also hopes to see her customer satisfaction increase, as thanks to the loan they will be offered a greater choice of products.

Profits are quite sufficient to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to expand her stock of goods for her restaurant

loans.name: Heman

texts.en:
Heman is very thankful to Kiva lenders for helping him with his rice cultivation. 

He has repaid his loan fully and on time to Kiva lenders. With the profits of the loan he has renovated his house by changing the roof. He also could save some money for his daughter's study.  
 
Heman wants more help from Kiva lenders and Seva MFI so he can save more. He has requested another loan of SRD 12,000 to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his rice production.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides and fertilizers for his rice production.

loans.name: Sana

texts.en: Because Sana is a conservative woman, she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Sana was born in 1974. She is a married lady and a mother of five. Sana has been trying her best to support her husband financially by running her mini market for one year. She is now seeking a loan to expand her mini market by adding new types of food products such as canned food so that she will raise her profit in order to be able to cover her children's needs.

loans.use: to buy new types of food products for her mini market

loans.name: Kilwin Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Mme MARIAM représente le groupe KILWIN BENKADI. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 08ans et le moins âgé a 04mois. 01 va à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge. 
Depuis 04ans, Mme vend des condiments. Elle s’approvisionne dans le marché de son secteur. 
Elle veut s’acheter 03 sacs de condiments frais (choux, tomate fraiche, etc.) et de condiments secs (gombo sec, épices etc.). 
Elle compte épargner ses bénéfices pour réinvestir dans son commerce. Mme ambitionne agrandir son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mariam represents group Kilwin Benkadi. She is in good health, married, and a mother of two. Her eldest is eight years old and the youngest is four month old. One of the children goes to school. She has three dependents in total.

For four years, Mrs. Mariam has been selling condiments. She procures her products from a local market.

She wants to purchase three bags of fresh produce (such as cabbage, fresh tomatoes, etc.) and dried condiments (dried okra, spices, etc.)

She is planning on saving profits to reinvest in her business. Mrs. Mariam's ambition is to grow her business and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy three bags of fresh produce (cabbage, fresh tomatoes, etc.) and dry condiments (dried okra, spices, etc.)

loans.name: Dharmen

texts.en: Dharmen is very thankful to Kiva lenders for helping him realize his dream of saving for his own rice plot. He has repaid his loan fully, and with the help of Kiva lenders, he saved some money. But, that is not enough to buy a new rice plot. That’s why he needs another loan of 9,900 Surinamese dollars to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for the next season: so he can save more.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
Salome is a mother of three running a small retail business in Nairobi. She was born in Machakos but moved to Nairobi later in search of employment. 

After several unsuccessful attempts she decided to start a small business to help her  raise some income for her upkeep. She learnt about the Fresh Life Franchise one day as she was going about her daily activities. She took keen interest and wanted to know more about the initiative. She later realised that she also could be part of the movement and increase her income. 

She seeks a loan to help her purchase and run two Fresh Life Toilets (pay per use). She hopes that her toilets will replicate the impact of having proper sanitation facilities and increase her income. She aspires to grow her franchise in future to spread proper sanitation further into the community.

loans.use: To purchase and run  two Fresh Life toilets

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business buying and selling bananas and root crops in the Philippines. Magdalena has been in this business for 20 years now.

Magdalena requested an 11,000 Philippine peso loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to buy more bananas and root crops to sell. In the future, Magdalena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and root crops to sell

loans.name: Rita

texts.en: Rita is a 51-year-old businesswoman who has been successfully selling polyester, diapers and lining in a kiosk for 28 years and this has been her source of income. She is married to Francis, a civil worker and stays together with her husband in the Teshie district in Ghana. With the requested Kiva loan, Rita is planning to make bulk purchases of polyester, diapers and lining so that the volume of her sales and profits will increase. With the additional profits, she aspires to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchases polyester, diapers and lining

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es: Oscar es soltero y no tiene hijos Vive en El Alto en la casa de sus padres Oscar se gana la vida como chofer y entre los riesgos de su profesión están los accidentes automovilísticos Oscar necesita un credito para pagar el mantenimiento de su movilidad, comprar llantas nuevas y hacer arreglo del motor Oscar es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar, sus padres dejaron de trabajar por eso no pueden ayudar a su hijo como él lo necesita.
texts.en: Oscar is single and doesn't have any children. He lives in his parents' house in El Alto. Oscar makes a living as a driver and car accidents are amongst the risks involved in his profession. Oscar needs a loan to pay for the maintenance of his vehicle, to buy new tyres and to repair the engine. Oscar is the sole source of income in his household, as his parents no longer work and are therefore unable to assist their son as he needs.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his vehicle, purchase new tyres and repair his vehicle's engine

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул 42 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. Семья очень дружная, супруг активно помогает по хозяйству. У Назгул - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Назгул занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1997 году с 12,500 сом (KGS). Целеустремленность, упорство и трудолюбие помогли ей развить бизнес до 2 дойных коров, 4 овец и 6 коз. Для содержания скота есть все условия, заготовлен корм и сено. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 14,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назгул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для покупки коз. Доходы от кредита Назгул планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и хочет накопить средства на постройку большого сарая.
texts.en: Nazgul is 42, married and raising two children together with her husband, who helps her tend to the family farm.  Her family is very close to one another.  Nazgul has the equivalent of a high-school education and raises livestock for a living, first starting in 1997 with 12,500 som worth of capital.  Her goal-oriented nature, persistence and love of hard work have helped her grow her business to the point where she has two dairy cows, four sheep and six goats on her farm, and makes nearly 14,000 som a month before expenses.  She has everything she needs to keep and maintain her animals, such as hay and other fodder.  To further develop her farm, Nazgul is seeking a loan from Bai-Tushum & Partners to buy goats.  She plans on using any additional income due to the loan to continue to add more animals to her farm, as well as to set aside money to build a new livestock shed.

loans.use: buy goats

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is married and works hard to support her family. She has an internet cafe business in the Philippines and has been in this business for 4 years now.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional computer and to pay electric and internet bills. Juliet would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase an additional computer and to pay for electric and internet bills.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase and run two Fresh Life Toilets.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik lives with her husband in Zaritap village in the Vayots Dzor region. The couple has been involved in cattle breeding for 4 years already. Specifically, they keep a livestock of a cow, three calves and 12 colonies of bees. Hasmik and her husband are very enthusiastic about developing their agribusiness so they will be able to have better living conditions. 

This requested loan of USD 1,000 will help Hasmik to purchase 2 more calves to expand the livestock. Please help this hardworking family to improve their farming business.

loans.use: to pay for 2 calves.

location.town: Zaritap village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Zoya

texts.en:
Zoya is an accountant by profession. She lives in the village of Vayk with her husband. Their children are married and live with their families.

Zoya is also engaged in cattle breeding. She keeps cows and 20 colonies of bees. Working with her husband, Zoya produces high-quality honey and sells it in local markets. By applying for this loan of US$1100, Zoya asks Kiva lenders to help her increase her livestock by paying for a calf and pig.

The loan is very important for Zoya, and she hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for a calf and pig

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more red oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fufu and fish for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, etc., for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dry fish for her business

loans.name: Ravi

texts.en:
Ravi thanks the Kiva lenders for helping him expand his rice production. With the profits he was able to pay the tuition for his children and could even renovate his house.

He has a tractor and needs to buy 4 new tires. With the tractor he can work in his fields and also in other farmers' fields. This can give him extra income for his family.

loans.use: To buy tires for his tractor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more used clothing for her business

loans.name: Rudradew

texts.en:
Rudradew is very pleased with the help from Kiva lenders and thanks them a lot for making it possible for him to save money for a new tractor. With the tractor he can work in his fields and also in fields of other farmers. This can give him an extra income for his family.

Rudradew repaid his loan on time and fully to Kiva lenders and asks them to help him once more with his rice cultivation so he can save more money for his tractor. The savings from last season were not enough to buy the tractor.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his rice cultivation.

loans.name: Soemant

texts.en:
Soemant is very thankful to all Kiva lenders for helping him to realize his dream. He has fully repaid his loan. However his profits were not enough to buy the tractor, and that’s why he needs another loan for his rice cultivation, so he can save more. 

With this loan of SRD 10,000 he could expand his production and save for his tractor with the profits.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, diesel fuel, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase pesticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, tomatoes, etc., in large quantities to sell in her business

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es: Nestor es casado, tiene 5 hijos y vive con sus suegros en una casa de adobe que le pertenece a la familia y esta ubicada en El Alto Nestor se gana la vida como vendedor de ropa usada y ayudante de cocina. Hay que aclarar que Nestor arregla las prendas que vende ya sea cociendo overoles, chamarras y renovando cualquier clase de ropa que ofrece al público, Nestor necesita credito para comprar telas, cierres, hilos y otros materiales. Nestor es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar por lo que necesita de su ayuda
texts.en: Nestor is married, has 5 children and lives with his parents-in-law in an adobe house belonging to the family and located in El Alto. Nestor makes a living as a used clothing salesman and kitchen assistant. It is worth pointing out that Nestor repairs the clothes he sells, whether it's sewing overalls, jackets or renovating any kind of clothes that he offers to the public. Nestor needs a loan to purchase fabrics, zips, threads and other materials. Nestor is the only source of income for his household which is why he needs your assistance.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, zips, threads and other materials for his business selling repaired used clothing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, tomatoes, etc., in large quantities to sell in her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, tomatoes, etc., in wholesale to add to her current merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, tomatoes, etc., in wholesale to add to her current merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy tomatoes, etc., at wholesale to add to her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy buy palm-oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, tomatoes, etc. from wholesalers to add to her business.
